senses.definition: #中樂 嘅其中一種古代流傳落嚟嘅記譜方式，將每一個音用一個漢字記錄。例如#粵劇 使用「合、士、乙、上、尺、工、反、六、五」，大約分別相等於#唱名 Sol、La、Ti、Do、Re、Mi、Fa、Sol、La，但係乙音低過Ti少少，反音高過Fa少少；用中州音發音，最接近嘅粵語讀音係「何士二saang3（『省』嘅第3調）車工番撩（liu1）烏」。喺#崑曲 中嘅工尺譜，則係「合、四、一、上、尺、工、凡、六、五、乙」。高八度時粵劇工尺譜加#雙企人「彳」偏旁，崑曲工尺譜加#單企人 偏旁「亻」；低八度時粵劇工尺譜加單企人偏旁，崑曲工尺譜加一撇喺字旁。（量詞：份） (gongche score, a traditional Chinese musical score notation that assigns each tone with a character, from Sol, to Sol in sol-fa names)

senses.definition: 揾大錢，多指以非法或不正當手段賺錢；民國早期沿用大清印製嘅蟠龍大洋，稱為「龍洋」；1948年民國政府推出金圓券未幾大幅貶值一事，大眾紛紛將錢換成外匯，政府隨即禁止兑匯，廣東人就以#鹹龍 作暗號代表廣東最常見嘅外幣：港元，刮龍當時就指「黑市搜刮港元」 (to make a lot of money, especially through illegal or unethical means. During the early Republic of China, the Qing Dynasty coin, "Dragon Dollar" was still in use. In 1948, after ROC government introduced the "Gold Dollar Note", which quickly depreciated, people rushed to exchange their money for foreign currency. The government then banned currency exchange. Cantonese people used "Salty Dragon" (#鹹龍) as a code for the most common foreign currency: the HK dollar; literally: to collect dragon, means to hoard HK dollars on the black market.)

senses.definition: 狗住嘅地方；引申為好亂或者好污糟嘅地方，亦係講自己屋企（特別指自己張牀）（量詞：個） ((lit.) dog den; (fig.) untidy place where things are disorderly arranged; your home, especially your bed)

senses.definition: 原本柔軟或者可以郁動嘅嘢變得硬而且不易活動 (stiff and rigid)

examples.text: 你嘅面部表情太過僵硬嚹。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ge3 min6 bou6 biu2 cing4 taai3 gwo3 goeng1 ngaang6 laa3
examples.translation: Your facial expressions are too stiff.

senses.definition: 好大聲咁講嘢，通常係一啲短句 (to shout; to yell; to call out)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 giu3 gam3 daai6 seng1!
examples.translation: Don't shout so loudly!

senses.definition: 向對方打招呼 (to greet by addressing somebody verbally)

senses.definition: 要求對方賣一啲嘢，或者提供一啲服務 (to request for services; to order; to buy)

senses.definition: 動物發出嘅聲音 ((of an animal) to call; (of an insect or bird) to sing; to chirp)

senses.definition: 可以當成；#算 (can be considered; can be regarded as)

senses.definition: 令到人生有意義嘅興趣或者責任 (sustenance; usually refers to hobbies or commitments that give meaning to one's life; raison d'être)

senses.definition: 失去咗#父母 嘅小朋友（量詞：個） (orphan)

senses.definition: 大年紀 (great age)

senses.definition: 單調；無味道 (tasteless; weak)

senses.definition: 加喺「#冇」以外嘅單音節動詞後面，表示對受事者嘅否定，並且處於比較高漲嘅情緒狀態 (not (after monosyllabic verbs except #冇 mou5); used in a relatively heightened emotional state to negate the patient)

examples.text: 佢都 short short 哋嘅，我理鬼佢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dou1 sot1 sot1 dei2 ge3, ngo5 lei5 gwai2 keoi5.
examples.translation: He is such an imbecile. I've had enough with him.

senses.definition: 表示處於比較高漲嘅情緒狀態，聚焦喺對動作嘅否定；冇主語嘅話，就代指「冇（任何）人」、「一個人都冇」，表示施事者從缺 (used in a relatively heightened emotional state to focus on the negation of the action and, when without subjects, to denote the absence of agents, as an equivalent of indefinite pronouns "nobody" and "no one" in English)

senses.definition: 喺動詞後面加強語氣，而該動詞通常係單音節同及物；比「#死」同埋後綴更加貼近動詞 (intensifier following verbs which are usually monosyllabic and transitive, closer than #死 sei2 and suffices to the verb)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 zau2 gwai2 saai3, laai6 dai1 ngo5 jat1 go3.

senses.definition: 長條形#螢光#燈 嘅俗稱，原理係以#電 力激發玻璃管內氣體產生#紫外線，內壁嘅#磷 質吸收紫外線後產生可見光（量詞：支） (fluorescent light; strip light)

senses.definition: 處於大壓力嘅狀態，冇得發泄 (to be in a state of high pressure, without any outlet for venting)

examples.jyutping: jau5 me1 m4 hoi1 sam1 m4 hou2 guk1 zyu6, gong2 ceot1 lai4 laa1.
examples.translation: If you're unhappy, don't hold it inside. Spit it out.

senses.definition: 好#靈巧 咁（通常係喺#打交 嗰陣）透過甩走自己個外殼嚟走佬。 (to escape while leaving the outer layer  or a decoy; literally: "the golden cicada sheds its shell")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頭先阿松打打吓交玩金蟬脱殼，跟手就畀人告佢話佢暴露。
examples.translation: Just now, A-chung slipped out of his clothes during the fight to confuse his enemies. He ended up accused of exhibitionism.

senses.definition: 對未發生嘅事或者未知嘅資訊做預測 (to estimate; to guess; to speculate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gu2 syu3
examples.translation: to estimate a value

senses.definition: 紀律部隊#學校 或者#軍校 嘅#老師 (instructor at a military academy, police academy, or other institution that is geared towards instilling a great deal of discipline; literally: teaching official)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松頭先畀教官罰佢跑#操場 十個圈，結果佢因為#孱 得滯跑跑吓暈咗。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 tau4 sin1 bei2 gaau3 gun1 fat6 keoi5 paau2 cou1 coeng4 sap6 go3 hyun1, git3 gwo2 keoi5 jan1 wai6 saan4 dak1 zai6 paau2 paau2 haa2 wan4 zo2
examples.translation: Just now, the instructor made A-chung run ten laps as punishment. However, A-chung was so weak that he fainted halfway through.

senses.definition: 用嚟表達怒氣或挫折感嘅嘆詞 (expression of anger or frustration; ugh; dang it; bah)
senses.label: 感嘆詞

examples.text: 點解嗰條友嘅成績會好過我㗎？激氣！
examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 go2 tiu4 jau2 ge3 sing4 zik1 wui5 hou2 gwo3 ngo5 gaa3? gik1 hei3!
examples.translation: How could that guy's grades be better than mine? Ugh!

senses.definition: 病耐咗，對醫理都熟咗 (to become familiar with medicine due to one's prolonged illness)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢做藥煲做咗十年有多，藥性、副作用知得一清二楚，已經久病成醫。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zou6 joek6 bou1 zou6 zo2 sap6 nin4 jau5 do1, joek6 sing3, fu3 zok3 jung6 zi1 dak1 jat1 cing1 ji6 co2, ji5 ging1 gau2 beng6 sing4 ji1.
examples.translation: Having been on medication for over ten years, he's become well-versed in its nature and side effects.

senses.definition: 屋企出大事，一般指分離、爭鬥（量詞：場） (major happening in a family, usually indicating separation or fights)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢同屋企人炒大鑊炒到家變咁滯。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 tung4 uk1 kei2 jan4 caau2 daai6 wok6 caau2 dou3 gaa1 bin3 gam3 zai6.
examples.translation: He had a big argument with his family, and now their relationships are strained beyond recognition.

senses.definition: （通常講#啡色）#咖啡、#泥土 嘅#顏色 ((usually shortened as #啡色 fe1 sik1) brown (colour); literally: coffee colour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你睇！你搞到條裙一撻撻咖啡色嘞。
examples.jyutping: nei5 tai2! nei5 gaau2 dou3 tiu4 kwan4 jat1 daat3 daat3 gaa3 fe1 sik1 laak3.
examples.translation: Look! You got brown stains all over your dress.

senses.definition: 挖#礦物；#採礦 (to mine (minerals, etc); to extract from earth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 十九世紀好多人俾人#賣豬仔 去掘礦。
examples.jyutping: sap6 gau2 sai3 gei2 hou2 do1 jan4 bei jan4 maai6 zyu1 zai2 heoi3 gwat6 kwong3.
examples.translation: In the nineteenth century, many people were sold abroad into slavery to work in mines.

senses.definition: 幫#加密貨幣 公共鏈系統驗證帳簿，從而賺取利潤 (to mine (cryptocurrency))
形容液體似膏狀，流動速度好慢 (liquid with a thick texture; low viscosity)

senses.definition: 認識並且承認大家之間嘅朋友關係 (to befriend; to associate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 響出面結交朋友，最忌就係小氣。
examples.jyutping: hoeng2 ceot1 min6 git3 gaau1 pang4 jau5, zeoi3 gei6 zau6 hai6 siu2 hei3.

senses.definition: 女仔將長#頭髮#紮 埋一嚿，令到啲頭髮唔會垂落嚟（量詞：個） (a bun; woman's hairstyle where the hair is gathered into a round shape at the back of the head)

senses.definition: 以視覺同聽覺媒介提供簡單嘅資料報告 （量詞:份/本/個） (brief report; bulletin; summary report)

senses.definition: #漫畫；用圖畫講故事嘅書 （量詞：本） (comic; comic book)

senses.definition: 廣義指圖多過字嘅書，例如#八卦雜誌 (book with more pictures than words)

examples.text: 今晚落機竇決一高下啦！
examples.jyutping: gam1 maan5 lok6 gei1 dau3 kyut3 jat1 gou1 haa6 laa1!
examples.translation: Let's have a decisive match at the arcade tonight!

senses.definition: 檢查、注視、跟進一件事/一樣嘢嘅變化 (to monitor; to inspect; to watch)

examples.translation: to monitor

senses.definition: 管理、督促 (to manage, to supervise, to urge)

senses.definition: 強迫、勉強人哋去做一件事 (to force sby to do sth)

examples.text: 呢個夏天又濕又熱，好易感暑，要飲返多啲食療湯水去濕消暑。
examples.translation: This summer is very hot and humid, making it easy for people to get overheated. Drinking more soup as a dietary remedy will help cool you down.

senses.definition: 最近 (recently; in recent times)

senses.definition: （通常指女性）因應自己嘅身份而保持嘅拘束、克制、冷靜 ((usually of women) reservedness, restraint, calmness that suit with one's status)

senses.definition: 比喻成性飢渴到唔揀擇性伴侶 (figuratively, too eager for sex with whoever)
同人有#仇口；因為得罪過人或者畀人得罪，令到至少其中一方產生厭惡嘅感覺 (to develop hatred; to plant loath)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 giu3 zou6 bong1 gwo3 haa5 sau2 gam2 lo1.

senses.definition: 即係#做愛，為咗享受而進行#性行為 (to make love; to make out)

senses.definition: 喺某啲行業任職之後，避免去有利益關係嘅工作嘅制度（亦叫「旋轉門」） (to go through a lock-up period to prevent somebody from working in certain fields because of the conflict of interests)

examples.text: 好多高官退休之後，過完冷河即刻跳去私人企業工作。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 gou1 gun1 teoi3 jau1 zi1 hau6, gwo3 jyun4 laang5 ho4 zik1 hak1 tiu3 heoi3 si1 jan4 kei5 jip6 gung1 zok3.
examples.translation: After their retirement, many top officials enter employment with private firms straight after their lock-up period.

senses.definition: 冇辦法達成共識；討論完之後仍然揾唔到一致嘅意見 (to be unable to reach a consensus)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 gong2 m4 maai4 laan1, gan1 zyu6 zau6 gok3 zi6 zau2 zo2 heoi3.

examples.text: 同你都講唔埋欄嘅，我明明都唔係講緊呢樣嘢。
examples.jyutping: tung4 nei5 dou1 gong2 m4 maai4 laan1 ge2, ngo5 ming4 ming4 dou1 m4 hai6 gong2 gan2 nei1 joeng6 je5.
examples.translation: I can't find a common ground for our discussion. You don't get the point I'm talking about.

senses.definition: 一個計劃裏面，仍然未將各個部份整合 (the sides are still far apart)

examples.text: 邊有咁快，幾樣嘢都未講得埋欄。
examples.jyutping: bin1 jau5 gam3 faai3, gei2 joeng6 je5 dou1 mei6 gong2 dak1 maai4 laan1.
examples.translation: We have to wait. The issues are far from resolved.

senses.definition: #教學 用嘅#材料（量詞：個／份／套） (teaching material)

examples.jyutping: bou2 cung1 gaau3 coi4
examples.translation: supplementary material

senses.definition: 特別擅長於體育活動嘅人；體育選手；可以引申為身體強健嘅人（量詞：名/位/個） (good athlete)

examples.text: 香港健兒喺運動會攞到三個金牌。
examples.translation: The Hong Kong athletes won three gold medals in the sports competition.

senses.definition: 形容女仔嬌小、嬌嗲、細細粒、的的式式 (small and delicate; petite; commonly used to describe a woman)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 睇妳個樣嬌滴滴咁，估唔到妳咁做得嘢喎。
examples.jyutping: tai2 nei5 go3 joeng2 giu1 dik1 dik1 gam2, gu2 m4 dou3 nei5 gam3 zou6 dak1 je5 wo3.
examples.translation: You look delicate, but you're surprisingly capable.

senses.definition: 一種病症；會令到腹部腫脹、面色泛黃 (abdominal distension (from liver disease); ascites; cirrhosis)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #到底；#其實；用喺問句入面加強質問嘅意思（唔可以用喺冇疑問代詞、又冇「#唔」「#未」嘅問句） (actually; exactly; used to intensify the "questioning" sense of certain types questions, but never used with questions lacking a question word, #唔 or #未)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 gau3 ging2 soeng2 jiu3 mat1 je5 aa3?

examples.translation: You did me a huge favor, I truly appreciate your help.

examples.translation: to hurry to finish a homework assignment

senses.definition:
有#超自然 力量（通常係#魔法）阻隔外界影響嘅範圍；源於#日本 嘅民間信仰（量詞：個） (supernatural boundary or barrier that blocks outside influence, especially in a religious or magical context; originates from Japanese folk beliefs
jpn:結界（けっかい）)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松佢話乜鬼嘢落咗個結界喺間房度令到我入唔到去，但係我一步就踩咗入去都冇嘢。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 keoi5 waa6 mat1 gwai2 je5 lok6 zo2 go3 git3 gaai3 hai2 gaan1 fong2 dou6 ling6 dou3 ngo5 jap6 m4 dou2 heoi3, daan6 hai6 ngo5 jat1 bou6 zau6 caai2 zo2 jap6 heoi3 dou1 mou5 je5.
examples.translation: A-chung claimed that he placed an enchantment stopping me from entering the room, but I stepped right in without any issues.

senses.definition: 純粹估計和猜測，對答案不確定 (guessing)

examples.text: 我唔知我嘅答案係咪啱架，我估估下㗎咋。

examples.translation: I'm not sure if my answer is correct; I'm just guessing.

senses.definition: 時不時提起 (to mention someone or something all the time; literally: to hang on the lips)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你係噉將你啲陳年舊事掛喺嘴唇邊，聽到我都就嚟識背喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 hai6 gam2 zoeng1 nei5 di1 can4 nin4 gau6 si6 gwaa3 hai2 zeoi2 seon4 bin1, teng1 dou3 ngo5 dou1 zau6 lai4 sik1 bui6 laa3.
examples.translation: You tell those stories from your past so often that I can almost recite them by heart.

senses.definition: 疑問代詞，用嚟問咩時間、時間長度，或者形容詞、副詞程度 (an interrogative pronoun for the time, duration of a period of time, or extent of an adjective or adverb)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: gei2 si4
examples.translation: when

senses.definition: 疑問代詞，用嚟提問數量，或者表示未明嘅數量；後面只可以接單字名詞或者量詞；雖然係「#幾多」嘅縮略，不過「幾」可以配序數前綴「#第」、「#初」，「幾多」就唔得；喺一串序數之中，「幾」通常代表一個數位，同樣係單音節，唔似得「幾多」能夠代表基位數組合 (how many; how much; an interrogative pronoun; it can only be followed by a single-character noun or measure word, but it can be preceded by the ordinal prefixes #第 dai6 and #初 co1; this is unlike its longer counterpart #幾多 gei2 do1, which can represent a group of atomic and base numbers in a numeric sequence, and which cannot be preceded by the aforementioned ordinal prefixes)

加咗綠色色素嘅#辣根 蓉，由於山葵好貴，一般好平嘅wasabi醬撈咗好多辣根蓉入去，不過香港人都係叫芥辣 (horseradish paste with green pigment, often sold as "wasabi" or a replacement for wasabi)

examples.text: 我啲同事成日夾份整蠱我。
examples.translation: My colleagues often gang up to play tricks on me.

examples.text: 呢份禮物係我哋夾份送俾你嘅。
examples.jyutping: ni1 fan6 lai5 mat6 hai6 ngo5 dei6 gaap3 fan2 sung3 bei2 nei5 ge3.
examples.translation: We pooled our money together to buy this gift for you.

senses.definition: 檢查合唔合乎規格同標準 (to proofread)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: gaau3 deoi3
examples.translation: to proofread

senses.definition: 軍官 (military field officer)

examples.jyutping: soeng6 gaau3
examples.translation: colonel

senses.definition: 向人表示；通知 (to tell; to state; to inform)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: tung1 gou3
examples.translation: notice

senses.definition: 表示某種情況出現 (to indicate a certain situation)

examples.jyutping: gou3 gap1
examples.translation: to be in a state of emergency and in need of immediate help

senses.definition: 即係#阿公；阿媽嘅阿爸 (maternal grandfather)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 對老年男人嘅稱呼（量詞：位） (used to address or refer to old men)

examples.text: 我讓個位俾呢位公公坐啦。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 joeng6 go3 wai2 bei2 ni1 wai2 gung4 gung1 co5 laa1.
examples.translation: Let me offer my seat to this elderly gentleman.

senses.definition: 即係「#空」；因為「空」音同「#凶」，所以有人為咗避諱而改口講相反義嘅「吉」 (empty (#空); used in place of "空", a homophone of "凶" (unlucky) i.e. "吉"'s opposite)

examples.jyutping: gat1 hap2
examples.translation: empty box

senses.definition: 達到需要或者合資格嘅份量、程度 (enough; sufficient; as much as necessary or qualified)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 gau3 cin2 maai5 san1 din6 waa2 laa3.
examples.translation: I have enough money to buy a new phone.

senses.definition: 比得上 (as ... as someone)

examples.jyutping: dim2 gau3 nei5 dei6 waan2 aa3?
examples.translation: How can I compete with you?

senses.definition: 有時，#久不久 (sometimes; occasionally)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我間唔時都會飲吓茶㗎。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gaan1 m4 si2 dou1 wui5 jam2 haa5 caa4 gaa3.

senses.definition: 問對方時間嘅長短 (how long; a question word for duration of time)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 hai2 dou6 dang2 zo2 gei2 noi6 aa3?
examples.translation: How long have you been waiting?

senses.definition: 減低#租金 (to lower the rent)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 家陣仲諗住業主會減租？唔加都執返身彩嘍。
examples.jyutping: gaa1 zan2 zung6 nam2 zyu6 jip6 zyu2 wui5 gaam2 zou1? m4 gaa1 dou1 zap1 faan1 san1 coi2 lo3.
examples.translation: Do you really think that your landlord will reduce the rent? You'd be extremely fortunate if it doesn't increase.

senses.definition: 由個名度可以知道咩含義 (as the name suggests; self-explanatory; self-evident)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 瓜子面顧名思義，就係一個人嘅面型好似瓜子咁樣。
examples.jyutping: gwaa1 zi2 min6 gu3 ming4 si1 ji6, zau6 hai6 jat1 go3 jan4 ge3 min6 jing4 hou2 ci5 gwaa1 zi2 gam2 joeng2.
examples.translation: An oval face, as the name suggests, has an oval shape.

senses.definition: 承接建築工程嘅公司，包括打地基、起樓、裝修同維修保養等等 (construction company)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: He works at a construction company.

senses.definition: 為政治目的服務嘅#軍事 組織（量詞：支） (troops; the armed forces)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 美國嘅軍隊認第二，冇人敢認第一。
examples.jyutping: mei5 gwok3 ge3 gwan1 deoi2 jing6 dai6 ji6 mou5 jan4 gam2 jing6 dai6 jat1.
examples.translation: The US army is considered the strongest in the world.

senses.definition: 表示同自己嘅諗法唔同，想同對方確認 (used to seek confirmation of a fact that differs from the speaker's previous conception)
senses.label: 助詞

examples.jyutping: mat1 hai6 gam2 gaa4?
examples.translation: Oh, is that so?

senses.definition: 用於反詰，有啲怪緊對方 (used to form a rhetorical question)

examples.jyutping: nei5 so4 gaa4?
examples.translation: Are you stupid?

senses.definition: 貶損甚至冒犯某人嘅後綴；有時都會當反話用以示親暱 (derogatory or even offensive suffix to mean "person" or "guy"; sometimes also used in mock affectionate irritation)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: si2 fat1 gwai2
examples.translation: a general derogative with no specific meaning or gender; literally: ass ghost

senses.definition: 表示外國人，特別係白人；貶抑嘅意味已經冇以前咁濃 (a slang against foreigners from the West, especially Caucasians; its derogative tone has softened quite a lot in recent years)

examples.jyutping: gwai2 lou2
examples.translation: a man of foreign origin; "gwei lo"; literally: ghost guy

senses.definition: 插喺副詞「#咁」、「#好」、「#幾」、「#勁」、「#最」，同形容詞之間，表示程度強烈 (infix between adverbs, including #咁 gam3, #好 hou2, #幾 gei2, #勁 ging6 or #最 zeoi3, and adjectives to denote a strong degree)

examples.jyutping: gam3 gwai2
examples.translation: so

senses.definition: 插喺否定副詞「#唔」、「#咪」，同動詞、形容詞之間，加強否定語氣 (infix between negation adverbs like #唔 m4 and #咪 mai5, and verbs / adjectives to intensify negation; "not ... at all"; "extremely not")

examples.jyutping: m4 gwai2 zi1 keoi5 lai4 m4 lai4 aa3!
examples.translation: How would I know whether she will come?

senses.definition: 插喺褒義或含肯定義嘅形容詞、動詞第一個音節之後，用作否定 (affixed to negate any adjective or verb with a positive or affirmative connotation, after its first syllable; "not ... at all"; "extremely not")

examples.jyutping: jau5 gwai2 cin2
examples.translation: not goddamn rich at all

senses.definition: 插喺若干非褒義形容詞、副詞、代詞、述賓式動詞第一個音節之後，加強貶義 (infix used to strengthen the negative connotation after the first syllable of certain non-positive adjectives, adverbs, pronouns, or predicate-object compound verbs)

examples.jyutping: maa4 gwai2 faan4
examples.translation: to be very troublesome

senses.definition: 好凍又好肚餓，形容人窮困嘅情況 (to suffer from hunger and cold; to be poverty-stricken)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 每年都有唔少人因為飢寒交迫而死。
examples.jyutping: mui5 nin4 dou1 jau5 m4 siu2 jan4 jan1 wai6 gei1 hon4 gaau1 bik1 ji4 sei2.
examples.translation: Many people die from hunger and cold every year.

senses.definition: 空間窄小，空氣唔流通 (cramped and suffocating; restricted in space)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: This room is very small and crowded.

senses.definition: #改動 文字 (to change the wordings; to rewrite)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 篇文我改寫過好多次喇。
examples.jyutping: pin1 man2 ngo5 goi2 se2 gwo3 hou2 do1 ci3 laa3.
examples.translation: I've revised this essay multiple times.

senses.definition: 改變某樣嘢嘅發展 (to change the course of development)

examples.jyutping: goi2 se2 ming6 wan6
examples.translation: to change someone's life

senses.definition: 米入面嘅黑蟲仔，又稱米象或米象鼻蟲 (Rice weevil)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲米生谷牛，要快啲食晒佢喇。
examples.jyutping: di1 mai5 saang1 guk1 ngau4, jiu3 faai3 di1 sik6 saai3 keoi5 laa3.
examples.translation: The grain beetles have infested the rice, we should eat it quickly.

senses.definition: 通常係單音節嘅動詞、形容詞嘅後綴，指示針對對象嘅過程未完成、未做晒，仲有缺漏，離終止仲有截距離；做形容詞後綴嗰陣，置於構成比較級嘅後綴「#啲」之前；若然對象係名詞詞組，必須有量詞修飾 (used after a verb or an adjective, often monosyllabic, to signify incompleteness of the process regarding the object; when placed after an adjective, it precedes the suffix #啲 di1 ("a bit") which forms comparatives; when the object is a noun phrase, it must be modified with a classifier)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: bong1 ngo5 sik6 gam2 di1 faan6 aa1.
examples.translation: Could you help me finish up my serving of rice?

senses.definition: 達到某種數量或者程度，但係仍然不如預期，仲有落差 (to fall behind or to fail to meet the expectation, though there is already a certain amount or extent)

examples.jyutping: siu2 gam2 go3 wai2
examples.translation: still to lack a seat

senses.definition: 指少量錢 (tiny amount of money, as much as chicken feed)

examples.jyutping: zou6 zuk1 seng4 jat6, dou1 hai6 dak1 go2 gai1 seoi3 gam3 do1.
examples.translation: After working all day, we only earned a small amount of money.

senses.definition: 將兩個性質差唔多嘅嘢並列，即係「#夾」，冇咁正式，而家少咗人用 ((informal and less usual) and; as well as)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 件長衫 #揦脷 兼夾老土！
examples.jyutping: gin6 coeng4 saam1 laa2 lei6 gim1 gaap3 lou5 tou2!
examples.translation: This long gown is overpriced and very old-fashioned!

senses.definition: 瞓得唔安穩嘅覺 (light sleep)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: bi4 bi1 fan3 maai4 di1 gau2 sat1 gaau3, gei2 go3 zi6 zau6 seng2.

senses.definition: 快啲做、完成一件事 (to speed up; to accelerate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gaa1 cuk1 hoi1 fong3 gwok3 noi6 si5 coeng4

senses.definition: 非常、十分之、極之 (dreadfully; awfully; extremely)

senses.definition: 即係#骨（量詞：個／條） (bone)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Dogs love to chew bones.

senses.definition: 人嘅性格，係一種幽默嘅講法 (personality)

examples.translation: x

senses.definition: 用喺句末，表示自己（唔可以係其他人）唔肯定或者遲疑嘅嘢 (used at the end of a sentence to express something that the speaker (but not another person) is unsure or hesitant about; similar to uncertainty conveyed by  "I guess ...")

examples.jyutping: ngo5 nam2 ngo5 wui5 lai4 sik6 faan6 gwaa3.

senses.definition: 用喺句尾，委婉噉指出對方錯誤；睇嚟；睇怕 (used at the end of a sentence to correct the other party in a less confrontational way)

examples.jyutping: m4 hai6 gwaa3?

senses.definition: 用眼睇到；靠眼睛接收外來影像而感知 (to see; to perceive visually)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 soeng2 zoi3 gin3 dou2 ni1 gau6 je5.

examples.translation: to see the world

examples.jyutping: hou2 noi6 mou5 gin3!
examples.translation: Long time no see!

senses.definition: 同某人按計劃，為咗某個目的喺埋一齊；#會面；#會合；#見面 (to meet for a particular purpose, usually for some sort of formal matter or to discuss business)

senses.definition: #覺得；#考慮；#顧慮；#顧及 (to feel; to consider; to regard)

examples.jyutping: nei5 gin3 dim2 aa3? sai2 m4 sai2 tai2 ji1 sang1?
examples.translation: How are you feeling? Do you need to see a doctor?

senses.definition: 形容人嘅言談或者舉止會引起其他人笑 (funny)

examples.jyutping: go3 siu2 cau2 hou2 gaau2 siu3!
examples.translation: That clown is funny!

senses.definition: 諷刺人行為好奇怪、唔正常 (laughable; weird; nonsensical; goofy; bizarre)

examples.jyutping: mat1 nei5 gam3 gaau2 siu3 gaa3! ming4 ming4 waa6 m4 zung1 ji3, zau2 zo2 zi1 hau6 jau6 jiu3 maai5!

senses.definition: #固執，#自以為是 (self-opinionated, obstinate and bumptious)

examples.text: 張小姐係個剛愎自用嘅人，從來都唔會聽人意見。
examples.jyutping: zoeng1 siu2 ze2 hai6 go3 gong1 bik1 zi6 jung6 ge3 jan4, cung4 loi4 dou1 m4 wui5 teng1 jan4 ji3 gin3.

senses.definition: 交人名；交名單 (to reveal a name; to submit a name list)

examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 jiu3 ngo5 gaau1 jan4, ceng2 sik6 si6 ziu1 caau2 jau2.

senses.definition: #報到 (to report one's presence)

examples.jyutping: zoi3 m4 gaau1 jan4 lou5 po4 naau6 laa3!
examples.translation: If I'm not home soon, my wife will give me a hard time!

senses.definition: 有力量、能量得以支持、負荷 (with enough energy and able to support or endure something)

examples.text: 個勾唔夠力㗎，唔好掛件大褸上去。
examples.jyutping: go3 ngau1 m4 gau3 lik6 gaa3, m4 hou2 gwaa3 gin6 daai6 lau1 soeng5 heoi3.
examples.translation: Don't hang an overcoat—the hook can't hold it.

senses.definition: 表示以#小時 作為計算單位；見 #鐘頭 (classifier for hours; period of an hour or hours)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: gei2 do1 go3 zung1
examples.translation: how many hours

senses.definition: 行路唔順暢 (to limp)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: haang4 lou6 gwaai2 haa5 gwaai2 haa5
examples.translation: to limp along

senses.definition: #偷 咗人哋嘅細路，再利用細路仔嚟揾錢 (to abduct)

examples.text: 你唔拖實媽咪會俾人拐咗你去㗎！
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 to1 sat6 maa1 mi4 wui5 bei2 jan4 gwaai2 zo2 nei5 heoi3 gaa3!
examples.translation: If you don't hold onto Mommy's hand, someone might kidnap you and take you away.

senses.definition: 英文「gay」嘅音譯；一般專指男 #同性戀，不過有時亦都包括女同性戀 (homosexual; gay; usually used specifically for males but sometimes used for females)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我有好多朋友係基嘅，聽過好多佢哋遇到嘅問題。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jau5 hou2 do1 pang4 jau5 hai6 gei1 ge3, teng1 gwo3 hou2 do1 keoi5 dei6 jyu6 dou2 ge3 man6 tai4.
examples.translation: I have many friends who are gay, and I have heard the many problems that they face.

senses.definition: 出自部份人對男同性戀嘅定型，亦會用嚟形容男人乸型、冇男人味 (due to common stereotypes of gay people, also used to describe men who are feminine or lack masculinity)

examples.text: 佢好基㗎，成日喺屋企做facial，又買好多護膚品。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 gei1 gaa3, seng4 jat6 hai2 uk1 kei2 zou6 fei1 sou4, jau6 maai5 hou2 do1 wu6 fu1 ban2.
examples.translation: He is such a sissy. He does facial treatments at home all the time, and he buys a lot of skin care products.

senses.definition: 有內鬼、背叛者嫌疑 (open to suspicion that one may be a traitor)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 條友三番四次鬆章畀對家，鬼到爆。
examples.jyutping: tiu4 jau2 saam1 faan1 sei3 ci3 sung1 zoeng1 bei2 deoi3 gaa1, gwai2 dou3 baau3.
examples.translation: This dude keeps making moves that benefit the opponent. So suspicious.

senses.definition: 樣貌、行為或者説話方式似外國人或者混血兒 (alike foreigners from the West, especially Caucasians)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 go3 joeng2 gwai2 gwai2 dei2.
examples.translation: He/she looks somewhat like a foreigner.

senses.definition: 問人#狀態 好唔好 (to ask whether someone is fine; "How does someone feel?")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你見點啊？使唔使睇醫生？
examples.jyutping: nei5 gin3 dim2 aa3? sai2 m4 sai2 tai2 ji1 sang1?
examples.translation: How are you feeling? Do you need to see a doctor?

senses.definition: 用嚟輕輕帶過啲唔想提起嘅嘢 (a phrase similar to "It's no big deal!", to express indifference, insignificance)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你上年罰咗幾張#牛肉乾 話？哎，講呢啲。
examples.jyutping: nei5 soeng6 nin2 fat6 zo2 gei2 zoeng1 ngau4 juk6 gon1 waa2? ai2, gong2 ni1 di1.
examples.translation: How many parking tickets did you get last year? Bah, don't mention it.

senses.definition: 客氣説話；同#唔使客氣 (a phrase similar to "Anytime.", "Don’t mention it.")

examples.jyutping: hing1 dai6 zi1 gaan1 gong2 ni1 di1.
examples.translation: Don't mention it, dude.

senses.definition: 標示動作緊接着前面嘅事件發生 (then; afterwards)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 嗰個女學生一開始只係細細聲喊，繼而大聲噉喊。
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 neoi5 hok6 saang1 jat1 hoi1 ci2 zi2 hai6 sai3 sai3 seng1 haam3, gai3 ji4 daai6 seng1 gam2 haam3.
examples.translation: She first began to weep and then cried loudly.

phonetic.original: gaak3 je6 jau4 zaa3 gwai2:gaak3 je2 jau4 zaa3 gwai2

senses.definition: 比喻怯懦、軟弱嘅人；就似油炸鬼放過夜會淋晒，唔似啱啱炸好咁硬身。 (a weak, feeble person. Literally: left-over dough sticks)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 俾人恰梗係要反抗㗎啦，點可以好似隔夜油炸鬼，淋滋滋？
examples.jyutping: bei2 jan4 hap1 gang2 hai6 jiu3 faan2 kong3 gaa3 laa1, dim2 ho2 ji5 hou2 ci5 gaak3 je6 jau4 zaa3 gwai2, lam4 zi4 zi4?
examples.translation: If someone bullies you, you have to stand up for yourself; you can't always be weak and submissive.

senses.definition: 比喻員工對工作不再熱心、不再爽快；類似#老油條 (staff becoming halfhearted and lacking enthusiasm)

examples.text: 佢響呢間公司做咗十幾年，做到成條隔夜油炸鬼咁。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hoeng2 ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 zou6 zo2 sap6 gei2 nin4, zou6 dou3 seng4 tiu4 gaak3 je6 jau4 zaa3 gwai2 gam2.
examples.translation: He has been at this company for over ten years; he's been here so long that he lacks enthusiasm and does everything halfheartedly.

keywords: gaak3 je6 jau4 zaa3 gwai2:gaak3 je2 jau4 zaa3 gwai2

senses.definition: 即係#二五仔；出賣自己效忠嘅團體嘅人 （量詞:個） (spy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有奸細入咗我哋嘅組織，畀我知係邊個我一定打佢靶。
examples.translation: There is a rat among us. If I find him, I will not let him live.

senses.definition: 強勁嘅敵人或者對手（量詞：個） (a strong adversary; a powerful enemy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋入圍賽就遇到呢隊勁敵，真係唔好彩。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 jap6 wai4 coi3 zau6 jyu6 dou2 ni1 deoi6 ging6 dik6, zan1 hai6 m4 hou2 coi2.
examples.translation: Unfortunately, they met a formidable opponent in the qualifying rounds.

senses.definition: 百#蚊；前面配數詞一至到九，或者半 (hundred dollars; preceded by numerals 1-9 or #半 bun3 (a half))
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: fo2 gei3! m4 goi1 jat1 gau6 seoi2 caa1 siu1!
examples.translation: Excuse me, can I have $100 worth of char siu please?

senses.definition: 同#講嘢 (to talk)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你講説話唔可以咁無禮貌！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gong2 syut3 waa6 m4 ho2 ji5 gam3 mou5 lai5 maau6!
examples.translation: You can't speak so rudely!

senses.definition: 特意將講一啲嘢俾人聽，而唔明言佢嘅意思；畀説話 (to imply; to suggest)

examples.text: 吓，你咁都唔明？佢擺到明係講説話你聽啦。
examples.jyutping: haa2, nei5 gam2 dou1 m4 ming4? keoi5 baai2 dou3 ming4 hai6 gong2 syut3 waa6 nei5 teng1 laa1.
examples.translation: What? Don't you get it? He's obviously implying something to you.

senses.definition: 品質最高級嘅#款式 、#種類 (the best of a kind)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個花樽係瓷器中嘅極品。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 faa1 zeon1 hai6 ci4 hei3 zung1 ge3 gik6 ban2.
examples.translation: This porcelain vase is the best of its kind.

senses.definition: 用嚟反諷人行為極為卑劣 (a sarcastic term describing someone's behaviour is abominable)

examples.text: 佢真係#港女 中嘅極品。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zan1 hai6 gong2 neoi2 zung1 ge3 gik6 ban2.
examples.translation: She's a unique specimen, even among the gold diggers.

senses.definition: 股票上市，公開買賣 ((of stocks) to be listed)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: san1 gu2 gwaa3 paai2
examples.translation: new stocks listed; IPO

senses.definition: 巴士或者車長固定行某條路線。喺未有電腦嘅年代，編更同派更都係純人手處理，車廠派更部有塊板，顯示每條路線編定由邊幾位車長當值，車長名會寫喺名牌上面，掛上塊板度。所以當一位車長編定行某條路線，佢個名牌就會掛喺嗰條線下面。 ((of buses or bus drivers) scheduled)

examples.text: 佢掛開2A牌㗎喎，未試過#甩牌。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gwaa3 hoi1 ji6 ei1 paai2 gaa3 wo3, mei6 si3 gwo3 lat1 paai2.
examples.translation: He's been assigned to route 2A so far, and hasn't been rescheduled elsewhere.

senses.definition: 死咗，而屍體已變僵硬，意指肯定無得救；瓜即係#瓜老襯 (a certain death, died and the corpse becomes stiff already, means surely no cure)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今次瓜直喇，臨交功課壞硬碟，乜都無晒。
examples.translation: I'm doomed! My hard drive crashed just before the deadline, and now I have nothing.

senses.definition: 物理現象，液體加熱到沸點，出現大量嘅氣泡，開始變成氣體 (to boil)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: seoi2 gwan2 zi1 hau6 lok6 saam1 gin6 zyu1 gwat1.
examples.translation: Once the water boils, add three pieces of pork bone.

senses.definition: 放食材入水煲熟做湯 (to prepare thin soup by adding ingredients to water and heating it all till it boils)

examples.jyutping: gwan2 tong1
examples.translation: to make thin soup

senses.definition: 勾搭男人或女人；通常指結咗婚嘅男性去召妓 (to mess around with other women or men; typically used to refer to married men who mess around with prostitutes)

examples.text: 我唔信你老公晚晚去滾。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 seon3 nei5 lou5 gung1 maan5 maan5 heoi3 gwan2.
examples.translation: I don't think your husband is messing around every night.

senses.definition: 走、離開；通常喺對對方極度不滿，激動咁叫對方離開嘅時候用；粵語口語比較少用 (Clear off! Get lost! (not commonly used))

examples.text: 滾開！邊個拳頭大，邊個話事。
examples.jyutping: gwan2 hoi1! bin1 go3 kyun4 tau4 daai6, bin1 go3 waa6 si6.
examples.translation: Step aside! Whoever has the larger fist, whoever calls the shots.

senses.definition: 呃；用欺詐或魯莽嘅手段得到一啲好處 (to deceive; to gain through using reckless or deceptive actions)

examples.text: 個女仔俾人滾大咗個肚。
examples.jyutping: go3 neoi5 zai2 bei2 jan4 gwan2 daai6 zo2 go3 tou5.
examples.translation: That girl got played by a man and got pregnant.

senses.definition: 吊頸自殺，場景就好似#風乾 臘鴨而將佢掛係繩、樑上面 (to commit suicide by hanging; literally: to hang cured duck)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢老竇上個月掛臘鴨啊！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 lou5 dau6 soeng6 go3 jyut6 gwaa3 laap6 aap3 aa3!
examples.translation: His father took his own life by hanging last month.

senses.definition: 西人，外國人；或指上司係外國人，#鬼佬 做你阿頭 (a westerner, a foreigner; or a boss who is a foreigner; literally: ghost head)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 以前公司由鬼頭話事，超時工作有錢補，福利齊全，感覺公平啲。依家換左華人老闆反而刻薄好多，呢樣又削果樣又減。
examples.translation: Previously, under management by westerners, our company offered extra pay for overtime and comprehensive benefits, which felt fair. Now with an ethnic Chinese boss, it has become more stingy, cutting budgets and benefits.

senses.definition: （做某個動作嘅）嗰一刻 (at that moment in time (of an action))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今日好大風，飛機降落嗰下真係好似騎緊馬噉。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 hou2 daai6 fung1, fei1 gei1 gong3 lok6 go2 haa5 zan1 hai6 hou2 ci5 ke4 gan2 maa5 gam2.
examples.translation: There were some strong winds today; when the plane was landing it felt like riding a horse!

senses.definition: 利用手段獲取名譽 (to pursue fame and compliments)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 地震發生之後，佢積極籌款，唔係為咗幫助災民，只係想沽名釣譽。最後啲錢大部份都係落咗自己友嘅袋。
examples.translation: After the earthquake, he actively fundraised not to help the victims but merely to seek fame and praise. In the end, most of the money ended up in his own friends' pockets.

senses.definition: 以最快嘅速度#賺錢 (to make quick money; literally: to dig gold)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 慶祝或者喜慶時候嘅説話，之後大家會一齊舉杯或#碰杯，然後飲晒杯裏面嘅飲料 (a phase used when toasting, like saying "cheers !" to each others before drinking wine; literally: drink up all)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: tung4 san1 long4 gon1 bui1!
examples.translation: A toast to the groom!

senses.definition: 將沖好嘅#茶 放落另一個嘅壺 (tea serving pot)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 謀取暴利；舊時 #放貴利 有「九出十三歸」嘅慣例：借10,000蚊，扣減1,000蚊做手續費，到手得9,000蚊，但係到期要還13,000蚊。 (figuratively refer to making an unreasonably high profit; In the past, loan sharks followed a practice - anyone request a loan of $10,000, $1,000 taken as administrative charge. They only get $9,000, and have to repay $13,000 on the due day.)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 形容人百無聊賴、周圍#hea (being idle by spending time doing nothing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我喺屋企鳩fing fing咗幾個月喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai2 uk1 kei2 gau1 fing6 fing6 zo2 gei2 go3 jyut6 laa3.
examples.translation: I've been idle at home for months.

senses.definition: （叫人）離開，帶有貶義 ((to tell someone) to leave and get lost)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: mou5 bong1 can3 zau6 gwo3 zyu2.
examples.translation: Please leave if you're not buying anything.

senses.definition: 頗為~ (very; quite)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 tai2 keoi5 gei2 gwai2 hoi1 sam1 aa3!
examples.translation: Look! How happy he is!

senses.definition: 將個女#嫁 俾人；個#女#結婚 (to marry off a daughter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 聽講你個女拍拖喎，你幾時嫁女啊？
examples.jyutping: teng1 gong2 nei5 go3 neoi2 paak3 to1 wo3, nei5 gei2 si4 gaa3 neoi2 aa3?
examples.translation: I heard your daughter is dating someone. Do you know when they might get married?

senses.definition: 好有迫切需要去#屙屎、#大便 (to need urgently to defecate; literally: urgent shit)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我好急屎，可唔可以幫我睇住啲嘢先？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 gap1 si2, ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 bong1 ngo5 tai2 zyu6 di1 je5 sin1?
examples.translation: I urgently need to take a dump. Could you please keep an eye on my belongings?

senses.definition: 比喻兩個人瞬間互相吸引，響愛情或性方面#一拍即合，尤如乾柴遇上烈火，一發不可收拾 (figuratively 2 persons attracted by each other instantly, and quickly build a close bonding of love or sex between them, just like the dry fire wood meeting a wild fire, no one can easily stop it)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢兩個見第二次面已去咗#開房，認真係乾柴烈火。
examples.translation: They went to a love hotel on their second date; it looks like they are really burning with desire.

senses.definition: 喺飛機上面偷竊嘅賊仔（量詞：隻） (thief on board of an aircraft; literally: cabin rat)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 空姐發現有隻機艙老鼠趁其他人瞓著，靜雞雞打開機艙行李櫃偷嘢。
examples.jyutping: hung1 ze2 faat3 jin6 jau5 zek3 gei1 cong1 lou5 syu2 can3 kei4 taa1 jan4 fan3 zoek6, zing6 gai1 gai1 daa2 hoi1 gei1 cong1 hang4 lei5 gwai6 tau1 je5.
examples.translation: A stewardess found a thief stealing from others' luggage when they were asleep.

senses.definition: 舊毛病、舊惡習又出現 (to go back to one's old bad habits)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢冇幾耐就故態復萌，都唔係誠心改過嘅！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mou5 gei2 noi6 zau6 gu3 taai3 fuk6 mang4, dou1 m4 hai6 sing4 sam1 goi2 gwo3 ge2!
examples.translation: He quickly returned to his old habits, proving he wasn't genuine about changing.

senses.definition: 用言語#挑剔 ；表達#懷疑 或者唔信任；#挖苦 ；#寸 (to be picky; to express doubts or distrust with words; to humiliate; to provoke)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唓，你又喺度趷住晒，你咁叻你做囉。
examples.jyutping: ce1, nei5 jau6 hai2 dou6 gat6 zyu6 saai3, nei5 gam3 lek1 nei5 zou6 lo1.
examples.translation: Ugh, you're just being overly critical without offering any real assistance. Why don't you take care of it yourself?

senses.definition: 成功#理解 到某樣嘢 (to comprehend; to understand)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 get1 m4 get1?
examples.translation: Are you getting it?

senses.definition: 成功#理解 到某樣嘢 (to understand)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 get1 m4 get1 dou2 ngo5 gong2 me1?
examples.translation: Do you understand what I'm saying?

senses.definition: 整蠱、陷害或欺騙人；原為#麻雀 術語，當洗好牌準備開局之前，若玩家懷疑有人洗牌出千可要求過牌，令疊好嘅牌位置亂咗，咁就算有人暗中放好牌於預定位置，都只會益咗其他人。原意類似「害人終害己」，但現時只有「揾人笨」嘅意思 (to set a trap for someone; to frame someone （to "set someone up"）.Originated from the jargon of mahjong, literally means "pass a block", which is a way to prevent tricks applied during the shuffle. Originally meant "to set a trap for someone but trapped oneself", nowadays in remains only "to set someone up".)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: Sigh, I've been tricked!

senses.definition: 男性白人（量詞：個） (gweilo, a Caucasian man; literally "ghost guy")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲鬼佬好鍾意喺蘭桂坊劈酒。
examples.jyutping: di1 gwai2 lou2 hou2 zung1 ji3 hai2 laan4 gwai3 fong1 pek3 zau2.
examples.translation: Foreigners love to get wasted in Lan Kwai Fong.

senses.definition: 鎖住犯人頸同腳嘅刑具（量詞：個） (cangue and shackles; while the cangue is a large, heavy flat board with a hole in the center that is locked around a prisoner's neck, the prisoner's ankle is locked by a shackle)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 引申指#束縛、#限制 (shackle  (usually used figuratively))

examples.jyutping: fong3 dai1 cam4 cung5 ge3 gam2 cing4 gaa1 so2
examples.translation: to release oneself from the heavy emotional burdens of love.

senses.definition: #便秘、大便乾結 (constipation)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 淮山可以止屙，但冇肚屙嘅話食太多會結恭。
examples.jyutping: waai4 saan1 ho2 ji5 zi2 o1, daan6 mou5 tou5 o1 ge3 waa2 sik6 taai3 do1 wui5 git3 gung1.
examples.translation: Chinese yam can help with diarrhea but eating too much when not having it may cause constipation.

senses.definition: 畀心機（落一樣嘢）；注意 (to attend to; to take care of one's emotional needs; to look after)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你唔好淨係顧住自己先得𠿪！
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 zing6 hai6 gu3 zyu6 zi6 gei2 sin1 dak1 gaa2
examples.translation: Don't only think about yourself!

senses.definition: 教育自己啲仔女 (to teach one's own son/daughter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你識唔識教仔㗎？成日俾個仔隨街屙尿。
examples.jyutping: nei5 sik1 m4 sik1 gaau3 zai2 gaa3? sing4 jat6 bei2 go3 zai2 ceoi4 gaai1 ngo1 niu6.
examples.translation: Do you know how to discipline your son? Don’t let him pee in public!

senses.definition: 對人不斷低聲講嘢，內容會令人厭煩甚至憤怒；不斷低聲投訴，發出怨言 (to mumble and grumble, to talk indistinctly; to complain indistinctly)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zyu1 do1 gi1 gat6
examples.translation: incessant muttering; blabbering

senses.definition: 程度更加高 (moreover; even more serious)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 平均樓價去年大幅上升，一千萬以上豪宅更甚。
examples.translation: Average house prices soared significantly last year, especially for luxury homes priced over ten million.

senses.definition: 對人哋個仔嘅敬稱（量詞:名/位/個） (polite designation for someone's son)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: How is your son doing?

senses.definition: 有錢仔；形容一個男人好風流快活 (buck; rich gamin)

examples.translation: spoiled brat

senses.definition: 唔等得，逼切，要即刻解決 (urgent; pressing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gan2 gap1
examples.translation: urgent

senses.definition: #快，#猛烈 (fast; rapid; violent; strong)

examples.jyutping: seoi2 lau4 hou2 gap1.
examples.translation: The current is very strong.

senses.definition: 好需要即刻解決生理（排泄）需要 (to urgently need to use the washroom; to urgently need to go to the toilet; to urgently need to relieve oneself)

examples.text: 我好急啊！你快啲出嚟俾我用廁所！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 gap1 aa3! nei5 faai3 di1 ceot1 lei4 bei2 ngo5 jung6 ci3 so2!
examples.translation: I urgently need to use the restroom! Please come out right away!

senses.definition: 喺埋怨嘅時候，用嚟帶出該狀況由咩事引起，好多時句尾配「#咩」 (to state what is to be blamed for, often used with #咩 me1 at sentence end; literally: the ghost told you to)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 鬼叫你唔去咩，而家唔夠人嘞。
examples.jyutping: gwai2 giu3 nei5 m4 heoi3 me1, ji4 gaa1 m4 gau3 jan4 laak3.
examples.translation: It's your fault for not going; now we're short-handed.

senses.definition: 嬲；不忿但係冇得發泄 (angry; bad tempered; moody; in a bad mood)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: daa2 gei1 jau6 syu1, zan1 hai6 guk1 hei3!
examples.translation: I can't believe I lost again at this game. It's infuriating!

senses.definition: 一件事、一個情況嘅重要階段（量詞:個） (critical point in a given situation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 恒指跌破左一萬點嘅心理關口。
examples.jyutping: hang4 zi2 dit3 po3 zo2 jat1 maan6 dim2 ge3 sam1 lei5 gwaan1 hau2.
examples.translation: The Hang Seng Index plunged below the psychological barrier of 10000 points.

senses.definition: 難關 (difficult situation)

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gwaan1 hau2 ngo5 dim2 gwo3 dou2 aa3.
examples.translation: How can I get through this challenging time?

senses.definition: 來往兩地嘅必經通道 (frontier pass; customs station; border crossing; checkpoint)

examples.text: 暫時未有計劃喺羅湖關口實施廿四小時通關。
examples.jyutping: zaam6 si4 mei6 jau5 gai3 waak6 hai2 lo4 wu4 gwaan1 hau2 sat6 si1 jaa6 sei3 siu2 si4 tung1 gwaan1.
examples.translation: There are no immediate plans to open Lo Wu's border crossing around the clock

senses.definition: 打扮或做事奇奇怪怪，亂七八糟噉樣 (acting or dressing strangely; to be eccentric)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 乜你今日着到鬼五馬六嘅？潮流嚟㗎？
examples.jyutping: mat1 nei5 gam1 jat6 zoek3 dou3 gwai2 ng5 maa5 luk6 ge2? ciu4 lau4 lai4 gaa4?
examples.translation: Why are you dressing up like that? Is this the latest trend?

senses.definition: 冇紅綠燈，唔俾行人用，俾汽車快速行駛嘅#公路（量詞：條） (highway; motorway)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 行高速公路，冇燈位，三個字就到。
examples.jyutping: haang4 gou1 cuk1 gung1 lou6, mou5 dang1 wai2, saam1 go3 zi6 zau6 dou3.
examples.translation: On the highway, without traffic lights, it will take about 15 minutes to get there.

senses.definition: 一個布製嘅罩，用幾條繩將人或者重嘢綁埋一齊，喺高空降落時用嚟減速同控制方向（量詞：個） (parachute)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你去過泰國跳降落傘未？
examples.translation: Have you ever been to Thailand for skydiving?

senses.definition: 鍾意撩是生非、冇嘢揾嘢來搞嘅人，通常都好乞人憎（量詞：條） (troublemaker; an annoying person who likes to stir up trouble and make a disturbance; literally: shit stirrer)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔關你事，你做乜插手？！正一攪屎棍！
examples.jyutping: m4 gwaan1 nei5 si6, nei5 zou6 mat1 caap3 sau2? zing3 jat1 gaau2 si2 gwan3!
examples.translation: That's none of your business. Why are you interfering? You're a troublemaker!

senses.definition: 國家入面所行嘅#法律 (national law)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 為咗追求所心儀、崇拜嘅女性（「#觀音」），而願意順從佢、俾佢利用，但係冇達成浪漫關係同得到名份嘅男性（量詞：個） (friendzoned suitor(s); a male who enters into a symbiotic but wholly subservient relationship with a "goddess" (whom he may worship but not approach), in which he is closer to a slave than a potential romantic partner; literally: soldier of Goddess of Mercy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你唔好當正自己係人哋條仔至得𠿪，人哋當你係觀音兵咋傻仔。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 dong3 zing3 zi6 gei2 hai6 jan4 dei6 tiu4 zai2 zi3 dak1 gaa2, jan4 dei6 dong3 nei5 hai6 gun1 jam1 bing1 zaa3 so4 zai2.
examples.translation: Don't think you're her boyfriend; she just sees you as a tool, you fool.

senses.definition: 形容言行舉止太過甜蜜，令其他人覺得#難頂 或者#尷尬 (cringe-making; nauseating)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我真係想像唔到你會做埋啲咁骨痺嘅嘢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zan1 hai6 soeng2 zoeng6 m4 dou2 nei5 wui5 zou6 maai4 di1 gam3 gwat1 bei3 ge3 je5.
examples.translation: I can't imagine you doing things that are so embarassing.

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zan1 hai6 m4 gaan2 daan1, lin4 taai3 hung1 dou1 soeng5 gwo3.
examples.translation: He's really not that ordinary as he's even been to space.

senses.definition: 指飯餸係平日喺屋企會整嘅 ((of meals or food) home-style; homely; home-made)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: gaa1 soeng4 bin6 faan6
examples.translation: home-style meal

senses.definition: 普通嘅飯餸；喺屋企多數會食嘅飯餸（量詞：餐） (homemade meal; home-style meal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我想請你嚟我屋企食餐家常便飯。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 soeng2 ceng2 nei5 lai4 ngo5 uk1 kei2 sik6 caan1 gaa1 soeng4 bin6 faan6.
examples.translation: I want to invite you over to have a home-style meal together.

senses.definition: 引申指日常經常發生嘅事 (figuratively, common occurrence; routine)

examples.text: 做研究碰釘係家常便飯。
examples.jyutping: zou6 jin4 gau3 pung3 deng1 hai6 gaa1 soeng4 bin6 faan6.
examples.translation: It is very common to face obstacles when doing research.

senses.definition: 同人比賽，去測試自己嘅水平 (to have a contest; to measure one's strength against someone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我好想揾個高手較量吓棋藝。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 soeng2 wan2 go3 gou1 sau2 gaau3 loeng6 haa5 kei4 ngai6.
examples.translation: I want to compete with a chess-master to find out where I stand.

senses.definition: 人型機器，或者自動做複雜工作嘅機器（量詞：部／個） (robot; android)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 工廠用越嚟越多機械人去整嘢。
examples.jyutping: gung1 cong2 jung6 jyut6 lai4 jyut6 do1 gei1 haai6 jan4 heoi3 zing2 je5.
examples.translation: Factories use more and more robots for manufacturing.

senses.definition: 而家呢刻所屬嘅日子；由對上一個午夜十二點至到即將嚟臨嘅午夜十二點呢段時間 (today)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 gei2 do1 hou6 aa3?
examples.translation: What is the date today?

senses.definition: 語言學術語，指#句子 入面啲#詞 同#短語 之間嘅排列、構造法則 ((linguistics) syntax; the configuration of constituents / words within a sentence)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 英文嘅句法同粵語好唔同，所以學嘅時候要留心。
examples.jyutping: jing1 man2 ge3 geoi3 faat3 tung4 jyut6 jyu5 hou2 m4 tung4, so2 ji5 hok6 ge3 si4 hau6 jiu3 lau4 sam1.
examples.translation: English syntax is very different from Cantonese syntax. So be careful when learning.

senses.definition: #每；#全部；#所有；強調獨立嘅個體 (every)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.text: 個個都#拍拖，唔通個個都想拍拖咩。
examples.jyutping: go3 go3 dou1 paak3 to1, m4 tung1 go3 go3 dou1 soeng2 paak3 to1 me1.
examples.translation: Everyone goes on a date, does it mean that everyone really wants to go on a date?

senses.definition: 藏身、避禍嘅地點或者方法多 (to burrow oneself in secret hideouts; literally: a cunning rabbit has three caves)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 嗰個大老千居無定所，狡兔三窟，分分鐘已經匿埋喺另一個私竇度，逃過追捕。
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 daai6 lou5 cin1 geoi1 mou4 ding6 so2, gaau2 tou3 saam1 fat1, fan1 fan1 zung1 ji5 ging1 nei1 maai4 hai2 ling6 jat1 go3 si1 dau3 dou6, tou4 gwo3 zeoi1 bou6.
examples.translation: That fraudster never stays in the same place and has a lot of hideouts. He has probably gone to another location to avoid arrest.

senses.definition: 少；缺少 (few; scant; little)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: cam4 mak6 gwaa2 jin4
examples.translation: uncommunicative

senses.definition: 死咗老公 (widowed)

examples.jyutping: sau2 gwaa2
examples.translation: to be a widow

senses.definition: 連同；同；合共；包括 (to include)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗰場比賽夾埋我總共有四個人跑，我攞銅牌。
examples.jyutping: go2 coeng4 bei2 coi3 gaap3 maai4 ngo5 zung2 gung6 jau5 sei3 go3 jan4 paau2, ngo5 lo2 tung4 paai4.
examples.translation: There were altogether four participants including me in the race, and I got the bronze medal.

senses.definition: #合謀；一齊計劃做啲有不良用意嘅事 (to plot together; to collude; to conspire)

examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 gaap3 maai4 lai4 waan2 ngo5!
examples.translation: You plotted together to trick me!

senses.definition: 大部分人都標緊嘅標準售價 (official price; reasonable price)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢啲公價貨嚟㗎，減唔到俾你。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 gung1 gaa3 fo3 lai4 gaa3, gaam2 m4 dou2 bei2 nei5.
examples.translation: Everyone is selling at this price. There's no room for further discount.

senses.definition: 講一啲#老作 嘅#言論。 (Literally "to speak ghost-ese", figuratively "to bullshit", or "to talk nonsense".)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿松佢話乜鬼嘢識通靈，我一聽就知佢講緊鬼話！
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 keoi5 waa6 mat1 gwai2 je5 tung1 ling4, ngo5 jat1 teng1 zau6 zi1 keoi5 gong2 gan2 gwai2 waa2!
examples.translation: A-chung babbled something about knowing necromancy. I knew he's bullshitting from the start!

senses.definition: 因為傳統、迷信、習慣或者他人感受，避免做某啲嘢 (to avoid or abstain from doing or saying something because of social pressure or norms)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 老細有地中海，所以我哋對個「光」字都有所忌諱。
examples.jyutping: lou5 sai3 jau5 dei6 zung1 hoi2, so2 ji5 ngo5 dei6 deoi3 go3 gwong1 zi6 dou1 jau5 so2 gei6 wai5.
examples.translation: Our boss is bald, therefore we avoid using any word that may rhyme with it.

senses.definition: 冇關係；冇相同、共通嘅地方 (irrelevant; different; literally: nine does not match with eight)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你講嘢都九唔搭八嘅，明明唔係講緊呢樣嘢。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gong2 je5 dou1 gau2 m4 daap3 baat3 ge2, ming4 ming4 m4 hai6 gong2 gan2 ni1 joeng6 je5.
examples.translation: You are saying something irrelevant, we are not talking about this right now.

senses.definition: #真係 (really; so)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 唔講堅係唔知，無諗過科大有得飲茶。
examples.jyutping: m4 gong2 gin1 hai6 m4 zi1, mou5 nam2 gwo3 fo1 daai6 jau5 dak1 jam2 caa4.
examples.translation: Who knew there'd be dim sum at HKUST [HK Univ. of Science and Tech.]! I would SO never have known without hearing about it from someone.

senses.definition: 構思、策略一個諗法 (plan; strategy; secret plot)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢啲咁卑鄙嘅計謀係得你先諗到。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 gam3 bei1 pei2 ge3 gai3 mau4 hai6 dak1 nei5 sin1 nam2 dou2.
examples.translation: Only can you devise such an underhand plan.

senses.definition: 非常大型 (gigantic, huge)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: geoi6 jing4 gwong2 gou3 paai2
examples.translation: billboard

senses.definition: 兩樣嘢之間嘅吸引力，呢樣吸引力唔可以用常理解讀（譬如利害關係、雙贏關係），感情係一種由衷嘅好感 （量詞:份/種） (love; affection; close bond)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋兩個嘅感情好好㗎！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 go3 ge3 gam2 cing4 hou2 hou2 gaa3!
examples.translation: They are very close!

senses.definition: 因為時間而產生嘅、相處耐咗而產生嘅好感 (emotional attachment)

examples.text: 點解你可以話走就走㗎？唔通你喺香港土生土長，對呢個地方冇感情咩？
examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 nei5 ho2 ji5 waa6 zau2 zau6 zau2 gaa3? m4 tung1 nei5 hai2 hoeng1 gong2 tou2 sang1 tou2 zoeng2, deoi3 ni1 go3 dei6 fong1 mou5 gam2 cing4 me1?
examples.translation: How can you leave this place just like that? Don't you have an attachment to this place having grown up here?

senses.definition: 理解某個人嘅情況，從而原諒佢；語氣比較正式 (to understand and forgive)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jyu4 jau5 bat1 bin6, ging3 cing2 gin3 loeng6.
examples.translation: We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

senses.definition: 腳掌最前嗰部份 (the tip of the toe)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jung6 goek3 zim1 haang4 lou6.
examples.translation: Walk on your toes.

senses.definition: 完全咁消滅或者徹底打擊一個人或者一樣嘢，唔畀佢有任何嘅生存空間 (to thoroughly drive away and exterminate someone/ something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 噴呢隻殺蟲水，一定可以將曱甴趕盡殺絕嘅。
examples.jyutping: pan3 ni1 zek3 saat3 cung4 seoi2, jat1 ding6 ho2 ji5 zoeng1 gaat6 zaat2 gon2 zeon6 saat3 zyut6 ge3.
examples.translation: With this insecticide, extermination of the roaches is assured.

senses.definition: 郵政服務，收件者必須出示身份證明先可以收取郵件 (registered mail; registration)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gwaa3 hou6 seon3
examples.translation: registered letter

senses.definition: 登記睇醫生 (registration of doctor appointment)

examples.jyutping: tai2 ji1 sang1 cin4 jiu3 gwaa3 hou6.
examples.translation: You should register before meeting with the doctor.

senses.definition: 西方傳統風格嘅音樂，特別係#協奏曲、#交響曲 同#奏鳴曲 等相對複雜，以#樂器 為主嘅樂曲，同埋加入人聲演唱嘅#歌劇 等；有時特指十八世紀中期至十九世紀初期（古典時期）嘅音樂 (classical music)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 小明約佢一齊去聽古典音樂，結果小明聽聽吓瞓著咗。
examples.jyutping: siu2 ming4 joek3 keoi5 jat1 cai4 heoi3 teng1 gu2 din2 jam1 ngok6, git3 gwo2 siu2 ming4 teng1 teng1 haa2 fan3 zoek6 zo2.
examples.translation: Siu-Ming invited her to attend a classical music concert together, yet Siu-Ming fell asleep during the concert.

senses.definition: 1997年，尤其指1997年香港主權移交中國 (the transfer of sovereignty of Hong Kong to China in 1997)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢九七前走咗，之後又返咗嚟，而家又話走。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gau2 cat1 cin4 zau2 zo2, zi1 hau6 jau6 faan1 zo2 lai4, ji4 gaa1 jau6 waa6 zau2.
examples.translation: He left before the transfer of sovereignty in 1997, but come back afterwards, and he is now leaving again.

senses.definition: 形容物件或者地方有一股古舊而且典雅嘅氛圍 (quaint; gracefully ancient; literally: ancient hues and ancient fragrances)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢間博物館佈置得古色古香。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 bok3 mat6 gun2 bou3 zi3 dak1 gu2 sik1 gu2 hoeng1.
examples.translation: The museum has a gracefully ancient atmosphere.

senses.definition: 官方網站嘅簡稱； 即組織或者主辦者所設置嘅網站，係唯一能夠代表該組織發佈資訊同發言嘅網站 (official website)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 拍賣網好多冒牌香水，去官網訂好過啦。
examples.jyutping: paak3 maai6 mong5 hou2 do1 mou6 paai4 hoeng1 seoi2, heoi3 gun1 mong5 deng6 hou2 gwo3 laa1.
examples.translation: Counterfeit fragrances are rampant in auction sites. You are better to visit the official website to order it.

senses.definition: 對於某人重要嘅時機（量詞：次） (opportunity; chance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 co3 gwo3 gei1 wui6
examples.translation: Don't miss the chance.

senses.definition: 可能性；#機率 (possibility; probability)

examples.jyutping: dou1 jau5 gei1 wui6 hai6 nei5 gong2 gam2 joeng2.
examples.translation: You could be right.

senses.definition: 即係#行 或者#走，但帶貶義，有侮辱性 ((insulting) to walk; to move)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: laan1 si1 gat6 lou6
examples.translation: go away

senses.definition: 行路嘅時候唔穩 (to hobble; to limp off)

examples.text: 佢整傷咗隻腳，所以行路有啲趷。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zing2 soeng1 zo2 zek3 goek3, so2 ji5 haang4 lou6 jau5 di1 gat6.
examples.translation: He hurts his leg, so he hobbles along the road.

senses.definition: 淨係用腳尖或者手去支撐，令身體抬高 (to stand on tiptoe; to sit up on the bed; to raise one's body with one's arms or tiptoe)

examples.text: 佢太矮，要趷高先掂到本書。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 taai3 ai2, jiu3 gat6 gou1 sin1 dim3 dou2 bun2 syu1.
examples.translation: He is too short, so he needs to stand on tiptoe in order to touch the book.

senses.definition: 單腳跳 (to jump in one foot)
蹺 (lift up)
翹起 (to raise up)

examples.jyutping: gat6 hei2 sau2 zi2 gung1
examples.translation: to raise up the thumb

senses.definition: 黑色、酸甜帶少少辣嘅醬汁，起源於英國（量詞：樽／支） (Worcestershire sauce)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多人中意食山竹牛肉、春卷點喼汁。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 jan4 zung1 ji3 sik6 saan1 zuk1 ngau4 juk6, ceon1 gyun2 dim2 gip1 zap1.
examples.translation: Many people like to dip steamed beef balls or spring rolls in Worcestershire sauce.

senses.definition: #非常；極高程度 (extremely; to the highest degree)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我哋對呢一單案件極其關注。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 deoi3 ni1 jat1 daan1 on3 gin2 gik6 kei4 gwaan1 zyu3.
examples.translation: We are paying extreme attention to this case.

senses.definition: 專名嘅簡略表示方式 (abbreviated form of a name; abbreviation; to be called something for short; shorthand; short form)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 香港簡稱為「港」；香港電台簡稱「港台」。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 gaan2 cing1 wai4 gong2, hoeng1 gong2 din6 toi4 gaan2 cing1 gong2 toi4.
examples.translation: Hong Kong is abbreviated as Kong; Radio Television Hong Kong is abbreviated as RTHK ("Kong Station").

senses.definition: 將#知識 灌輸畀其他人 (to educate, to teach)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gaau3 juk6 si5 man4
examples.translation: to educate the citizens

senses.definition: 神經處於繃緊嘅狀態 (anxious; nervous; tense)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 就快到我上台嘞，我真係好緊張。
examples.jyutping: zau6 faai3 dou3 ngo5 soeng5 toi4 laak3, ngo5 zan1 hai6 hou2 gan2 zoeng1.
examples.translation: It will soon be my turn to be on stage. I'm really nervous.

senses.definition: 唔充足，令人好難應付 (tight; of limited amount)

examples.jyutping: sek6 jau4 gung1 jing3 hou2 gan2 zoeng1.
examples.translation: The supply of petroleum is very tight.

senses.definition: 作為立論中心嘅設想或者猜測 (to postulate; to presume)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 喺證據不足嘅情況之下，法庭要假定犯人無罪。
examples.jyutping: hai2 zing3 geoi3 bat1 zuk1 ge3 cing4 fong3 zi1 haa6, faat3 ting4 jiu3 gaa2 ding6 faan6 jan4 mou4 zeoi6.
examples.translation: Under the circumstances of insufficient evidence, the court must presume the innocence of the suspect.

senses.definition: 表示提出自己嘅意見 (in my view; in my opinion)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 個蛋糕太大個喇，計我話切開佢留返一半之後食啦。
examples.jyutping: go3 daan6 gou1 taai3 daai6 go3 laa3, gai3 ngo5 waa6 cit3 hoi1 keoi5 lau4 faan1 jat1 bun3 zi1 hau6 sik6 laa1.
examples.translation: The cake is too large. Why not cut it and leave a half to eat later?

senses.definition: 將工作由一更交替到下一更 (to change shifts; to hand over one's duty to the next shift)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 仲有一粒鐘先交更，佢應該冇咁快嚟到辦公室住。
examples.jyutping: zung6 jau5 jat1 nap1 zung1 sin1 gaau1 gaang1, keoi5 jing1 goi1 mou5 gam3 faai3 lai4 dou3 baan6 gung1 sat1 zyu6.
examples.translation: It is now one hour before the handover. He should not be in the office that early.

senses.definition: #外耳道 同#中耳 中間嘅一層彈性灰白色半透明薄膜（量詞：塊） (eardrum, tympanic membrane)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 整穿鼓膜好大機會會影響聽力。
examples.jyutping: zing2 cyun1 gu2 mok2 hou2 daai6 gei1 wui6 wui5 jing2 hoeng2 ting3 lik6.
examples.translation: Perforation of the eardrum has a high chance of affecting hearing.

senses.definition: 調解紛爭；談判 (to negotiate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 tung4 hak1 se5 wui2 daai6 lou2 gong2 sou3
examples.translation: She negotiated with a triad boss.

senses.definition: 喺同一個地方、同時#存在，唔會互相#排斥 (to coexist)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 希望人類同動物可以共存啦。
examples.jyutping: hei1 mong6 jan4 leoi6 tung4 dung6 mat6 ho2 ji5 gung6 cyun4 laa1.
examples.translation: Hope that human and animals can coexist.

senses.definition: 一種外形模仿#陰莖 嘅#性玩具（量詞：條／碌／支） (dildo)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我喺阿妹牀下底揾到一碌假狗。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai2 aa3 mui2 cong4 haa6 dai2 wan2 dou2 jat1 luk1 gaa2 gau2.
examples.translation: I found a dildo under my sister's bed.

senses.definition: #可笑；#搞笑 (funny; ridiculous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 go3 gu3 si6 gam3 gek1?
examples.translation: Why is the story so ridiculous?

senses.definition: 出席一個隆重嘅儀式，通常指婚禮 (to attend a ceremony)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋結婚喎，你去唔去教堂觀禮啊？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 git3 fan1 wo3, nei5 heoi3 m4 heoi3 gaau3 tong2 gun1 lai5 aa3?
examples.translation: Aren't you going to the church to attend their wedding?

senses.definition: 一個動作或者因果嘅結果或者作用 (effect; effectiveness; efficacy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢隻藥對癌症治療功效顯著。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zek3 joek6 deoi3 ngaam4 zing3 zi6 liu4 gung1 haau6 hin2 zyu3.
examples.translation: This is an effective medicine to combat cancer.

senses.definition: 原本指潮水嘅高位，通常指一件事最緊張刺激嘅部份（量詞：個） (climax (literally high tide, the figurative sense is far more common))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: kek6 cing4 zeon3 jap6 gou1 ciu4.
examples.translation: The plot is entering its climax.

senses.definition: 即係性高潮，指性#張力 嘅突然釋放，通常伴隨住有節奏嘅肌肉收縮同性#愉悦 (orgasm; sexual climax)

examples.text: 基於生理結構唔同，男女對於性高潮呢樣嘢嘅反應亦相當唔同。
examples.jyutping: gei1 jyu1 sang1 lei5 git3 kau3 m4 tung4, naam4 neoi5 deoi3 jyu1 sing3 gou1 ciu4 ni1 joeng6 je5 ge3 faan2 jing3 jik6 soeng1 dong1 m4 tung4.
examples.translation: Due to differences in biological structure, men and women have very different responses to an orgasm.

senses.definition: 扮晒大牌嘅神態；自大；目中無人；即使個人係真係有料定冇料都可以用依個詞語 (arrogance, haughtiness, insolence)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: baai2 gaa3 zi2
examples.translation: put on airs; to pose in an arrogant manner

senses.definition: 家長寫俾學校嘅信，表示自己嘅決定（量詞：封／張） (parents' letter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你聽日交張簽咗嘅家長信畀我解釋點解你尋日冇返學。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ting1 jat6 gaau1 zoeng1 cim1 zo2 ge3 gaa1 zoeng2 seon3 bei2 ngo5 gaai2 sik1 dim2 gaai2 nei5 cam4 jat6 mou5 faan1 hok6.
examples.translation: Hand me a signed parents' letter tomorrow and tell me why you didn't come to school yesterday.

senses.definition: 學校話俾學生家長知嘅嘢；#通告 (letter to parents)

examples.jyutping: hok6 haau6 paai3 zo2 zoeng1 gaa1 zoeng2 seon3 faan1 lai4 gong2 haa6 nin2 zyun3 hok6 haau6 ken6 tin1 faan6 soeng1.
examples.translation: The school gave us a letter to parents, informing us that we are changing the canteen supplier next year.

senses.definition: 攪動而令物質混合或溶解 (to stir and mix evenly)

examples.translation: Put some salt into the soup. Serve after stirring and mixing evenly.

senses.definition: #勇敢；遇到難關唔會退縮；敢於冒險 (to have the guts; to dare to)

senses.definition: 船隻或者大魚入咗淺過佢入水位嘅水域，所以卡咗響度 (to run aground)

senses.definition: 指人因為生活富足，唔了解普通人嘅生活係點樣嘅；「真係脱離現實」 (tone-deaf; out of touch with the experience of ordinary people, often due to a pampered and sheltered upbringing)

examples.translation: He is so ridiculous that no one even bothers to explain what is happening to him.

senses.definition: 提出例子；假如 (to raise an example; for example)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 從既有嘅內容作總括性嘅描述 (to sum up; to conclude)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你做一次統計學嘅「集群分析」，將高分嘅字歸納做一組，你會發現我哋腦入面過十萬個詞語，可以分做幾大堆。

senses.definition: 後生嘅金髮白人女性（多數用嚟指從事賣淫嘅女仔） (a young blonde white woman (usually used to refer to those who engage in prostitution); literally: gold thread cat)

examples.text: 唔好食咁多膏喇。對身體冇益㗎。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 sik6 gam3 do1 gou1 laa3. deoi3 san1 tai2 mou5 jik1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Don't eat too much roe. It's not good for health.

senses.definition: #切身 體會到其他人嘅感受 (to feel others' experience as if of one's own)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 媽媽見到仔女痛，都會感同身受，對佢哋特別呵護。
examples.jyutping: maa4 maa1 gin3 dou2 zai2 neoi2 tung3, dou1 wui5 gam2 tung4 san1 sau6, deoi3 keoi5 dei6 dak6 bit6 ho1 wu6.
examples.translation: It is only natural for a mother to share her children's pain and take extra care for them.

senses.definition: 黐喺皮膚上面，用嚟冚住細傷口嘅#敷料（量詞：塊） (adhesive bandage; band-aid; plaster)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tip3 gaau1 bou3, nim4 gaau1 bou3, ci1 gaau1 bou3
examples.translation: to apply a band-aid

senses.definition: 用塑膠做原料整嘅#布 （量詞：條／塊） (textiles that are made out of plastic)
（帶貶義）對細微嘅嘢，尤其係錢銀或者幫人做嘢，好執着 ((derogatory) concerned or particular about every point or detail, especially money or favour)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 嗰幾蚊唔好斤斤計較啦！
examples.jyutping: go2 gei2 man1 m4 hou2 gan1 gan1 gai3 gaau3 laa1!
examples.translation: It's just a few bucks. Don't be so concerned about it.

senses.definition: 政府喺社會處於緊急狀態期間實施嘅措施，期間司法及行政權會部分或全部由軍警力量接管 (to enforce martial law)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 政府下令晚上十點後戒嚴。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 haa6 ling6 maan5 soeng6 sap6 dim2 hau6 gaai3 jim4.
examples.translation: The government has declared martial law after ten at night.

senses.definition: 將入面唔想要嘅嘢（液體、氣體、聲音、資訊）隔開 (to filter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gwo3 leoi6 din6 jau4
examples.translation: to filter emails

senses.definition: 表達祝賀嘅慣用短句 (idiomatic congratulatory remarks)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 對對方國家嘅尊稱 ((hon.) your honourable country)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: kei4 doi6 tung4 gwai3 gwok3 hap6 zok3.
examples.translation: I look forward to the cooperation with your honourable country.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
#粵人（廣府人）傳統嘅#餸菜，例如白切雞、點心 (Cantonese cuisine, the traditional cooking of the Cantonese people.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 香港同大陸廣東嘅人都鍾意食廣東菜。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 tung4 daai6 luk6 gwong2 dung1 ge3 jan4 dou1 zung1 ji1 sik6 gwong2 dung1 coi3.
examples.translation: Hongkongese and Cantonese from the mainland both love eating Cantonese cuisine.

senses.definition: 悶熱 (to be suffocating)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 間房冇窗嘅，唔怪得之呢度咁焗悶啦。
examples.jyutping: gaan1 fong2 mou5 coeng1 ge3, m4 gwaai3 dak1 zi1 ni1 dou6 gam3 guk6 mun6 laa1
examples.translation: No wonder the room is suffocating; it has no window.

senses.definition: 將過錯加諸自己或者他人身上 (to lay a blame on; to attribute a fault to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 將自己嘅失敗歸咎社會
examples.jyutping: zoeng1 zi6 gei2 ge3 sat1 baai6 gwai1 gau3 se5 wui2
examples.translation: to blame the society for one's own fault

senses.definition: 完成一樣人哋一早做咗一半嘅嘢 (to do something which had already been done partially; to finish up something)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 gan1 sau2 zou6 saai3 fan6 po1 zek4.
examples.translation: You will finish up the project.

senses.definition: 好快；過咗無幾耐；即刻 (next; then; after that)

examples.text: 一出左西隧跟手就截的士，睇嚟佢真係好急下。
examples.jyutping: jat1 ceot1 zo2 sai1 seoi6 gan1 sau2 zau6 zit6 dik1 si2, tai2 lai4 keoi5 zan1 hai6 hou2 gap1 haa5.
examples.translation: She hopped into a cab right after she got off from a bus at the Western Harbour Tunnel, seems like she is really in a hurry.

senses.definition: 雙方唔肯改變自己嘅立場 ((of both parties) to refuse to budge)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: goeng1 ci4 bat1 haa6
examples.translation: to lock others in a stalemate

senses.definition: 感情上嘅距離、溝通上嘅阻礙 (estrangement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一次家暴令夫妻間產生隔閡。
examples.jyutping: jat1 ci3 gaa1 bou6 ling6 fu1 cai1 gaan1 caan2 sang1 gaak3 hat6.
examples.translation: A happening of domestic violence caused estrangement between the spouse.

senses.definition: （汽車）手動#排擋 變速；「波」指 #波箱，「棍」即係操作波箱嘅手桿 ((of cars) manual transmission; manual gear shift)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你考車係考棍波定#自動波？
examples.jyutping: nei5 haau2 ce1 hai6 haau2 gwan3 bo1 ding6 zi6 dung6 bo1?
examples.translation: Are you getting a manual driving license or an automatic one?

senses.definition: 思想守舊，唔開明，唔願意接受新事物或者改變 (stiffly traditional; old-fashioned)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我媽媽好古板㗎，一定反對我哋同居㗎。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 maa4 maa1 hou2 gu2 baan2 gaa3, jat1 ding6 faan2 deoi3 ngo5 dei6 tung4 geoi1 gaa3.
examples.translation: My mom is old-fashioned. She won't permit our cohabitation.

senses.definition: 跟進某個人或者動物嘅每一步行動 (to keep watch on; to keep a lookout over)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我懷疑我老婆偷食，揾咗個偵探監視佢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 waai4 ji4 ngo5 lou5 po4 tau1 sik6, wan2 zo2 go3 zing1 taam3 gaam1 si6 keoi5.
examples.translation: I suspect my wife is cheating on me. I have hired a private detective to keep an eye on her.

senses.definition: 徹底打敗；打散 (to defeat; to crush)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 羅馬嘅軍隊喺呢場仗入面擊潰咗迦太基。
examples.jyutping: lo4 maa5 ge3 gwan1 deoi2 hai2 ni1 coeng4 zoeng3 jap6 min6 gik1 kui2 zo2 gaa1 taai3 gei1.
examples.translation: The Roman army completely defeated Carthage in this battle.

senses.definition: 未成年嘅人嘅父母（量詞:名/位/個） (parents)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gaa1 zoeng2 gaau3 si1 wui2
examples.translation: Parent-Teacher Association

senses.definition: 物品嘅價格等級，通常用嚟形容價格會浮動嘅嘢（量詞：個） (price level)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今朝呢隻債券嘅價位曾經大幅波動。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ziu1 ni1 zek3 zaai3 gyun3 ge3 gaa3 wai2 cang4 ging1 daai6 fuk1 bo1 dung6.
examples.translation: This morning has seen the large fluctuation of this bond.

senses.definition: 極度熱愛、投入工作，甚至犧牲空閒時間、其他活動嘅人（量詞：個） (workaholic)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tin1 saang1 gung1 zok3 kwong4
examples.translation: genuine workaholic; literally: inborn workaholic

senses.definition: 唔易爛、拉唔斷 (tough and tensile)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢種布料又真係幾堅韌，點扯都唔爛。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zung2 bou3 liu2 jau6 zan1 hai6 gei2 gin1 jan6, dim2 ce2 dou1 m4 laan6.
examples.translation: This is so tough cloth; I can stretch it with all my strength and it won't even tear for a bit.

senses.definition: 趕時間去做某樣嘢 (in a hurry; in a haste)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 你急住走咩？喺度食埋飯吖！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gap1 zyu6 zau2 me1? hai2 dou6 sik6 maai4 faan6 aa1!
examples.translation: Are you leaving in a hurry? Why don't you stay for dinner?

senses.definition: 無可置疑；當然；通常用嚟帶出共識之後，再表達質疑 (no doubt; undoubtedly; usually used to first restate the common ground, and then highlight what is in doubt)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 咁做固然好，只不過係怕佢唔鍾意啫。
examples.jyutping: gam2 zou6 gu3 jin4 hou2, zi2 bat1 gwo3 hai6 paa3 keoi5 m4 zung1 ji3 ze1.
examples.translation: There's no doubt that it's good for him, just that he may not like it.

senses.definition: 將一連串虛構或者真實嘅事件，經過修飾，加入個人觀點之後嘅描述（量詞：個） (story)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gong2 gu3 si6
examples.translation: to tell a story

senses.definition: 數學用語；揾出兩個數字之間嘅#差 (to deduct; to subtract)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: saam1 gaam2 ji6 dang2 jyu1 jat1.
examples.translation: 3 minus 2 equals 1.

senses.definition: 將數量、數值、份量降低 (to reduce; to decrease; to cut)

examples.jyutping: gaam2 san1
examples.translation: to have a reduction in salary

senses.definition: 祝賀人哋嘅喜事；為人哋嘅喜事同樣感到喜悦，並向佢表達 (to congratulate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gung1 hei2 saai3!
examples.translation: Congratulations!

senses.definition: 表示時間過去、事情完成、狀態去到某一個程度 (already)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 ging1 ji5 sap6 dim2 laa3.
examples.translation: It is already 10 pm.

senses.definition: 達到需要或者合資格嘅份量、程度 (enough; sufficiently; as much as necessary or qualified)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 sau6 gau3 laa3!
examples.translation: I've had enough!

senses.definition: 表示自己有同樣情況或感受；後面有時會帶出轉折 (as well; too (sometimes used before contrast))

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jyun3 ngo5? ngo5 gau3 jyun3 keoi5 lok3!
examples.translation: She's blaming me? I'm blaming her too!

senses.definition: #得人驚 到連#鬼 都覺得#驚 (Literally "terrifying for even ghosts", figuratively "extremely terrifying".)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 嗰套#恐怖片 真係鬼都怕。阿松重嚇到睇睇吓瀨咗尿。
examples.jyutping: go2 tou3 hung2 bou3 pin2 zan1 hai6 gwai2 dou1 paa3. aa3 cung4 zung6 haak3 dou3 tai2 tai2 haa5 laai6 zo2 niu6.
examples.translation: That horror movie is terrifying for even ghosts. A-chung was so scared he wet himself halfway through watching it.

senses.definition: 形容冇人想要 (refers to something that nobody wants; literally even a dog would not fuck (it))
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: tiu4 neoi2 gam3 jaap3, gau2 jaa5 bat1 diu2 laa1.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]That girl is so useless, even dogs won't bother with her.

senses.definition: 平面角弧度嘅量度單位，即#度（量詞：個） (degree of an angle)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 觀點；立場（量詞：個） (point of view; perspective)

examples.jyutping: gok3 dou6 man6 tai4
examples.translation: a matter of perspective

senses.definition: 形容人講野唔流利、窒下窒下噉 (stuttering; stammering)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 聽佢講嘢好辛苦，佢成日都口窒窒噉。
examples.jyutping: teng1 keoi5 gong2 je5 hou2 san1 fu2, keoi5 sing4 jat6 dou1 hau2 zat6 zat6 gam2.
examples.translation: It's so hard to be patient to her words as she always stutters.

senses.definition: 喺考試或者一啲考核入面，將一份冇寫過嘢嘅試卷交俾考官 (to hand in a blank exam paper, i.e. fail to answer any question or achieve any result)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 考試交白卷嘅話點會有分呀？
examples.jyutping: haau2 si3 gaau1 baak6 gyun2 ge3 waa2 dim2 wui5 jau5 fan1 aa3?
examples.translation: How can you get even one mark if you hand in a blank exam paper?

senses.definition: 冇做嘢；做唔到成績出嚟 (lack of action; be no further forward)

examples.text: 老闆咁信任我，叫我寫份計劃書，我點可以交白卷㗎！
examples.jyutping: lou5 baan2 gam3 seon3 jam6 ngo5, giu3 ngo5 se2 fan6 gai3 waak6 syu1, ngo5 dim2 ho2 ji5 gaau1 baak6 gyun2 gaa3!
examples.translation: How can I make no progress on the proposal when my boss is being confident with me?

senses.definition: 一個正式啲同埋傳統啲嘅詞語去描述男女#婚事 (a formal and traditional description of marriage between a man and a woman)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 中國有好多傳統嘅嫁娶禮儀。
examples.jyutping: zung1 gwok3 jau5 hou2 do1 cyun4 tung2 ge3 gaa3 ceoi2 lai5 ji4
examples.translation: There are many traditional rules of etiquette for marriage in China.

senses.definition: 講究技巧嘅#武藝、#工藝 (craftsmanship, the skill at creating things, can robe referring to either martial arts or industrial arts)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢啲珠寶展示咗精美嘅製作技藝。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 zyu1 bou2 zin2 si6 zo2 zing1 mei5 ge3 zai3 zok3 gei6 ngai6.
examples.translation: The jewellery showed exquisite craftsmanship.

senses.definition: 當某啲人係#陌生 人，維持一定距離，唔親近 (to regard somebody as an outsider (both positively and negatively used) (used politely))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: m4 sai2 gam3 gin3 ngoi2 wo3!
examples.translation: Don't consider yourself as an outsider!; Make yourself at home!

senses.definition: 有相當人數同比較正式嘅組織、團體（量詞：個／間） (organization)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ci4 sin6 gei1 kau3
examples.translation: charity organization

senses.definition: 事物構成嘅基礎（量詞：個） (structure; construction)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daai6 haa6 ge3 git3 kau3
examples.translation: structure of a building

senses.definition: 形容某一家人因為祖先山墳#風水 有利，得到保佑 ((of one's family) to be blessed and fortunate, thanks to the good fung shui of the mountain on which the coffins of their ancestors lie)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 對參與對話嘅雙方以外嘅個人嘅貶稱 (he; she; that person (derogatory); literally: that thing)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.text: 嗰隻嘢又喺度尖叫喇，黐線㗎！
examples.jyutping: go2 zek3 je5 jau6 hai2 dou6 zim1 giu3 laa3, ci1 sin3 gaa3!
examples.translation: That guy is screaming again. How insane he is!

senses.definition: 足球術語；指由#腳指尾 附近既地方起腳，用腳外側踢個足球，摩擦令球帶側旋（#西） ((of soccer) to kick by using the outer side of sole to add side spin, making the ball fly in curve; literally: little toe pull the side)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 嘩佢一個腳趾尾拉西，就將個波踢咗入龍門喇！
examples.jyutping: waa3 keoi5 jat1 go3 goek3 zi2 mei1 laai1 sai1, zau6 zoeng1 go3 bo1 tek3 zo2 jap6 lung4 mun4 laa3!
examples.translation: Wow he has made a curve shot with outer side of sole, and sent the ball into the goal!

senses.definition: 要祭祀鬼怪或者同鬼怪有關嘅節日，例如中國嘅#孟蘭節、西方嘅#萬聖節 (festival of ghosts)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 農曆七月十四日係中式嘅鬼節。
examples.jyutping: nung4 lik6 cat1 jyut6 sap6 sei3 jat6 hai6 zung1 sik1 ge3 gwai2 zit3.
examples.translation: The 14th day of the 7th lunar month is the Chinese Ghost Festival.

senses.definition: 每年嘅第九個月，喺西曆入面係小月，有三十日 (September)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gau2 jyut6 zau6 hoi1 hok6 laa3.
examples.translation: School starts in September.

senses.definition: 無多餘時間或者空閒 (without any time or space left)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: si4 gaan3 gan2 bik1, daap3 dik1 si2 laa1.
examples.translation: We have little time left. Let's rush to take the taxi.

senses.definition: 好消息 (good news; glad tidings)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我同佢表白咗喇，等緊佢嘅佳音。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 tung4 keoi5 biu2 baak6 zo2 laa3, dang2 gan2 keoi5 ge3 gaai1 jam1.
examples.translation: I have confessed my love to her and now I'm waiting for her to say "yes".

senses.definition: 聖誕節時專門用嚟傳福音嘅歌 (Christmas carols)

examples.text: 平安夜去尖沙咀海旁會見到唔少基督徒報佳音。
examples.jyutping: ping4 on1 je6 heoi3 zim1 saa1 zeoi2 hoi2 pong4 wui5 gin3 dou2 m4 siu2 gei1 duk1 tou4 bou3 gaai1 jam1.
examples.translation: There are many Christians singing Christmas carols along the TST Promenade on Christmas Eve.

senses.definition: #到期，係時候 (to be due (at a time))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gaa3 ce1 gau3 kei4 heoi3 jim6 laa3.
examples.translation: It's time to schedule an annual check for the car.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
令到一啲嘢到同以前唔同咗 (to change; to alter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你一下子改晒啲規矩，要我哋點適應啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 jat1 haa5 zi2 goi2 saai3 di1 kwai1 geoi2, jiu3 ngo5 dei6 dim2 sik1 jing3 aa3?
examples.translation: You have suddenly changed all the rules, how can we adapt to it?

senses.definition: #修正 錯誤 (to correct (a mistake); to fix)

examples.jyutping: zi1 co3 nang4 goi2
examples.translation: willing to make amends after acknowledging one's mistake

senses.definition: #批改 (to mark (a student's work); to grade (an assignment))

examples.jyutping: sin1 saang1 jat6 jat6 dou1 jiu3 goi2 gung1 fo3.
examples.translation: Teachers have to mark assignments every day.

senses.definition: #改名 (to give one their name; to name)

examples.text: 你個名係唔係你爺爺幫你改㗎？
examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 meng2 hai6 m4 hai6 nei5 je4 je2 bong1 nei5 goi2 gaa3?
examples.translation: Did your grandfather give you your name?

senses.definition: 網絡用語。指一個人特登假扮#戇鳩、引用經典失誤、假扮打錯字等，去吸引不知情者指正，然後取笑佢係#真心膠。 (one who is playing dumb; internet forum jargon; somebody intentionally writing fake stories or pieces of nonsense to attract serious readers and then make fun of their serious responses)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔好咁認真啦，條友假膠嚟。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 gam3 jing6 zan1 laa1, tiu4 jau2 gaa2 gaau1 lei4.
examples.translation: Don't be so serious, that guy is just playing dumb.

senses.definition: 母雞 (hen)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢行嚟行去，好似雞乸婆生蛋，屙屎唔出咁。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 haang4 lai4 haang4 heoi3, hou2 ci5 gai1 naa2 po4 saang1 daan2, o1 si2 m4 ceot1 gam2.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]He's indecisive, like a hen that can't lay eggs or poop.

senses.definition: 行動刻意#張揚，引人注意 (high-profile)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢咁高調講佢男朋友，驚死人哋唔知佢拍拖。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam3 gou1 diu6 gong2 keoi5 naam4 pang4 jau5, geng1 sei2 jan4 dei6 m4 zi1 keoi5 paak3 to1.
examples.translation: She talks about her boyfriend intentionally. It feels like she is afraid that we don't know she's in a relationship.

senses.definition: 為咗保存對某次活動或者某個地點嘅記憶，而獲得嘅物品（量詞：份／件） (souvenir; memento)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 每個參賽者完成咗比賽之後都會獲得紀念品一份。
examples.jyutping: mui5 go3 caam1 coi3 ze2 jyun4 sing4 zo2 bei2 coi3 zi1 hau6 dou1 wui5 wok6 dak1 gei2 nim6 ban2 jat1 fan6.
examples.translation: Every participant will receive a souvenir after finishing the competition.

senses.definition: 俾#行動不便 嘅人揸住幫助#行路 嘅工具（量詞：支） (assistive cane; walking stick; crutch)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松上個月跌親整傷咗盆骨，家吓要用一排拐杖。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 soeng6 go3 jyut6 dit3 can1 zing2 soeng1 zo2 pun4 gwat1, gaa1 haa5 jiu3 jung6 jat1 paai4 gwaai2 zoeng2.
examples.translation: A-chung fell and injured his pelvis last month. Now he'll be using a crutch for a while.

senses.definition: 做到噉嘅地步已經足夠達成目標 (to be enough)

examples.translation: Is this laptop enough for my child to do homework?

senses.definition: 舊時一種儀式，響眾人面前用金色盆洗手，表示自己從組織或活動中退出 ((literally) wash hands in the golden basin; An old ritual to show you will quit from an organization or an activity by washing your hand in a basin in front of your fellows)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 退休；以後唔再從事一個行業；以後唔再做一件事 (to retire)

examples.jyutping: zou6 zo2 ni1 hong4 gam3 noi6 zan1 hai6 jau5 di1 jim3 gyun6, waak6 ze2 hai6 si4 hau6 gam1 pun4 sai2 sau2 laa3.
examples.translation: Being in this business for long makes me feel bored, may be it is time to wash my hands and quit.

senses.definition: 由人類建造，為人類嘅活動提供空間嘅物體；例如屋、橋、隧道（量詞：幢／座） (building; structure; architecture)

examples.translation: historic buildings

senses.definition: 緊張、驚慌 (soul-stirring; profoundly affecting)

examples.jyutping: ni1 tou3 din6 jing2 zan1 hai6 ging1 sam1 dung6 paak3 aa3!
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]This movie is really thrilling!

senses.definition: 由強烈嘅認同感或者憐憫而產生嘅悲傷嘅感覺 (touching; moving)

examples.jyutping: ni1 tou3 din6 jing2 ge3 git3 mei5 zan1 hai6 ling6 ngo5 hou2 gam2 dung6.

senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 gaa1 zuk6 ceot1 zo2 nei5 ni1 go3 gam2 ge3 maai6 gwok3 caak3, zan1 hai6 gaa1 mun4 bat1 hang6!

jyutping: ging1 tin1 dei6 jap1 gwai2 san4

examples.jyutping: nei1 wai2 si1 fu2 ge3 dou1 gung1 zan1 hai6 ging1 tin1 dei6 jap1 gwai2 san4, bat1 kwai5 jau5 cyu4 san4 ge3 cing1 hou6.

ging tin dei jap gwai san

examples.translation: This novel is too difficult to understand. Are you only pretending to understand it?

senses.definition: 用記憶、文字或活動，將一啲令人懷念或者有意義嘅事物保留或者記錄落嚟 (to commemorate; to express a special feeling towards a person or an event using memory, words or activities)

examples.translation: anniversary day

examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 miu2 gung1 fung6 dong1 dei6 ge3 saan1 san4.

examples.jyutping: man4 zung3 baai2 cit3 gung3 ban2 zai3 zi6 mong4 ling4.
