senses.definition: 因為鞋太細或者鞋嘅質料唔透氣，令人著嘅時候覺得逼同焗 ((shoes) being uncomfortable and stuffy due to small size or poor ventilation material)

examples.translation: Unsurprisingly, cheap stuff is no good. This pair of shoes, that cost me a few tens of dollars, is really uncomfortable!

senses.definition: 亂嚟；冇深思熟慮；求其；唔理後果 (without reason; without planning; doing something frivolously; doing something in an unserious manner; without caring about the consequences)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 嗰啲一味鳩行嘅遊行示威真係令人唔想再去囉。
examples.jyutping: go2 di1 jat1 mei2 gau1 haang4 ge3 jau4 hang4 si6 wai1 zan1 hai6 ling6 jan4 m4 soeng2 zoi3 heoi3 lo1.
examples.translation: Protests where all you do is walk around, kind of make you never want to protest again.

senses.definition: 形容一樣嘢做完之後達唔到效果、徒勞無功 (after doing something, the result is worthless or the effort ends up in vain)

examples.text: 準備好晒啲嘢，你先話取消，咁我呢幾日做嘅嘢咪鳩做？
examples.jyutping: zeon2 bei6 hou2 saai3 di1 je5, nei5 sin1 waa6 ceoi2 siu1, gam2 ngo5 ni1 gei2 jat6 zou6 ge3 je5 mai6 gau1 zou6?
examples.translation: You're canceling the event after I made all the preparations, making all my previous efforts in vain.

senses.definition: 資金嘅融通。所有喺市場上籌集資金、投資、融資都係金融活動，當中包括貨幣嘅發行、流通同回籠，貸款嘅發放同回收，存款嘅存入同提取，以及匯兑等等。 (finance; banking)

examples.translation: HKMA announced about the operation of the banking system and financial market.

examples.translation: The loan agreements need to be notarized.

examples.translation: Reading more history books and cultural programs can broaden our horizons, allowing us to learn from the past and understand the development and significance of modern society.

senses.definition: 用嚟擺#先人 完整骸骨嘅罌（唔係#骨灰罌）；一般係土葬一段時間之後淨低棚骨，#執骨 之後清潔乾淨再擺入去嘅；外形一般係金黃色，大約半個人咁高嘅大罌（量詞：個） (a large urn for the bones of a deceased person, literally "gold tower")

He also said that strengthening enforcement is not about "collecting fines.

senses.definition: #合拍、#合襯 (well-matched)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你同阿明咁夾得埋，唔做情侶都做個朋友吖。
examples.jyutping: nei5 tung4 aa3 ming4 gam3 gaap3 dak1 maai4, m4 zou6 cing4 leoi5 dou1 zou6 go3 pang4 jau5 aa1.
examples.translation: You get along so well with Ah Ming. Why don't you become friends, if not lovers?

senses.definition: 行為良好；服從指令。 (well-behaved; obedient)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 gwaai1, teng1 waa6 m4 hou2 haam3 laa1.
examples.translation: Being obedient, don't cry.

senses.definition: 用工具喺物件嘅兩邊鉗住 (to pick up sth with chopsticks or other tools)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你教個仔用筷子夾嘢食啦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gaau3 go3 zai2 jung6 faai3 zi2 gaap3 je5 sik6 laa1!
examples.translation: You should teach your son to pick up food with chopsticks.

senses.definition: 合作；一齊商量 (to cooperate; to discuss; to collaborate)

examples.text: 佢哋兩個夾埋來整蠱我。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 go3 gaap3 maai4 lai4 zing2 gu2 ngo5.
examples.translation: Those two have teamed up to pull a trick on me.

senses.definition: 將某樣嘢嘅一部分由本體分離 (to cut; to slash)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: sau1 got3
examples.translation: to harvest

senses.definition: #救濟 一啲受災難影響嘅人，令佢地盡快過番正常生活 (to help those who are in a disaster)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cau4 fun2 gau3 zoi1
examples.translation: to raise funds for the victims

senses.definition: 創造一啲嘢；由零開始整或者加啲新嘅嘢落去 (to build; to construct; to contribute)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 建設一條橋需要好多人力物力。
examples.jyutping: gin3 cit3 jat1 tiu4 kiu4 seoi1 jiu3 hou2 do1 jan4 lik6 mat6 lik6.
examples.translation: To construct a bridge requires lots of resources.

senses.definition: 將過去嘅經過或者虛構嘅故事用口語嚟轉述俾其他人 (to give an account of; to narrate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gong2 seot6 jat1 go3 gu3 si6
examples.translation: to narrate a story

senses.definition: 仔細檢驗，睇下有冇唔尋常嘅地方 (to inspect; to examine)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gim2 caa4 hang4 lei5
examples.translation: to inspect one's luggage

senses.definition: 同#膊頭 (shoulder)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ng5 sap6 gin1
examples.translation: frozen shoulder; adhesive capsulitis

senses.definition: 對之前遇到嘅嘢有印象同埋意識 (to remember; to bear in mind; to recall)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gei3 dak1
examples.translation: to remember

senses.definition: 將歷史或者意念保存喺記憶以外嘅媒介，等之後有得參考，唔會唔記得 (to record; to make a note of; to mark down; to note down for future reference and not forget)

examples.jyutping: gei3 luk6
examples.translation: to record

senses.definition: 持續咁響一樣嘢嘅後邊行走 (to follow in a physical sense)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zek3 gau2 gan1 sat6 go3 zyu2 jan4
examples.translation: The dog follows its master.

senses.definition: #順從 一個人嘅#旨意 (to comply with an order, decree, instructions, etc.)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 wui5 gan1 ceoi4 keoi5 ge3 gaau3 fui3
examples.translation: I will follow his guidance.

senses.definition: 即係#執 (to pick up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 鑽石戒指跌咗喺街度，有咩可能執得返吖？
examples.jyutping: zyun3 sek6 gaai3 zi2 dit3 zo2 hai2 gaai1 dou6, jau5 me1 ho2 nang4 zap1 dak1 faan1 aa1?
examples.translation: It will not be possible to get your diamond ring back because you lost it on the street.

senses.definition: 冇人跡；人影都唔見 (completely deserted; literally: not even the shadow of a ghost)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 莫講話人吖，鬼影都冇隻啊。咩鬼地方嚟㗎？
examples.jyutping: mok6 gong2 waa6 jan4 aa1, gwai2 jing2 dou1 mou5 zek3 aa3. me1 gwai2 dei6 fong1 lai4 gaa3?
examples.translation: Nobody is here and it's completely deserted. What on earth is this place?

senses.definition: 歸結到根本，追究到最後 (after all; at the end)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: #嗌、#呼喚 (to call out; to shout)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: seoi4 hing1 hing1 giu3 wun6 ngo5?
examples.translation: Who calls me out?

senses.definition: 肚餓；冇食嘢 (hunger)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 要減肥就難免要忍受下飢餓。
examples.jyutping: jiu3 gaam2 fei4 zau6 naan4 min2 jiu3 jan2 sau6 haa5 gei1 ngo6.
examples.translation: You have to tolerate hunger for a while if you want to be slim.

senses.definition: 對人施予#援助，從而幫助人脱離危險嘅境況 (to rescue; to save; to help, thus to help get one out of dangerous situations)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gau3 meng6
examples.translation: to save one's life, usually used when one is crying for help

senses.definition: #制止；#阻止 (to stop; to deter)

examples.jyutping: gau3 fo2
examples.translation: to put out; to stop a fire

senses.definition: #治療 (to treat an illness or injury)

examples.jyutping: gap1 gau3
examples.translation: first aid; to save the life of one who is critically ill or injured

senses.definition: #改變；#改善 (to change; to improve)

examples.jyutping: mou5 dak1 gau3
examples.translation: (of a person) hopeless, cannot be changed or improved

senses.definition: 喺一個比賽擊敗其餘參賽者，贏得勝利嘅人；比賽嘅第一名（量詞：個） ((of competitions) champion; winner; first place)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gun3 gwan1 dak1 zyu2 hai6 aa3 ming4!
examples.translation: The winner is Ah Ming!

senses.definition: 表示 #感激 (to thank; to be grateful)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gam2 ze6 gok3 wai2 ge3 zi1 ci4
examples.translation: Thank you all for your support.

senses.definition: 棄用一啲原本用緊嘅嘢，轉用其他嘢 (to change over to; to switch to (an alternative))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 政府鼓勵的士司機改用無鉛汽油。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 gu2 lai6 dik1 si2 si1 gei1 goi2 jung6 mou4 jyun4 hei3 jau4.
examples.translation: The government encourages taxi drivers to switch to unleaded fuel.

senses.definition: 客家話，指#愛惜 (to take good care of; to value and carefully protect)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢好儆惜佢個書包㗎，從來唔會放落地下。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 geng6 sek3 keoi5 go3 syu1 baau1 gaa3,  cung4 loi4 m4 wui5 fong3 lok6 dei6 haa2.
examples.translation: She takes good care of her schoolbag, and never puts it on the floor.

senses.definition: 同#膊頭 (shoulder)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: baa4 baa1 ge3 bok3 tau4 hou2 fut3.
examples.translation: Dad's shoulders are wide.

senses.definition: #講 説話；用言語表達 (to say something; to talk)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你哋可唔可以靜啲等我講嘢呀？
examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 zing6 di1 dang2 ngo5 gong2 je5 aa3?
examples.translation: Can you guys be quiet and let me say something?

senses.definition: 指一個人説話同事實不符；作大；或者喺度講廢話 (to lie; to make an overstatement; to speak empty words)

examples.text: 你講嘢呀？我明明睇住你偷食咗件蛋糕。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gong2 je5 aa4? ngo5 ming4 ming4 tai2 zyu6 nei5 tau1 sik6 zo2 gin6 daan6 gou1.
examples.translation: You are lying! I saw you eating the cake with my own eyes.

senses.definition: 棋類遊戲，兩個人玩，棋盤有黑白相間嘅 64 格，一方用白棋另一方用黑棋，各自有 16 隻棋，一人行一步棋，首先令對方嘅國王冇棋行為之贏 (international chess; Western chess)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 引伸成對#前度 女朋友比較唔尊重嘅稱呼（參見「#菜」）（量詞：條） (a contemptuous term for an ex-girlfriend; literally: old vegetable)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你走去揾返你舊菜有乜謂吖？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zau2 heoi3 wan2 faan1 nei5 gau6 coi3 jau5 mat1 wai6 aa1?
examples.translation: What's the point in reaching out to your ex?

senses.definition: 身體、精神、社交生活正常，處於安寧嘅狀態 (healthy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: sik6 do1 di1 saang1 gwo2 wui5 gin6 hong1 di1.
examples.translation: You will be healthier if you eat more fruits.

senses.definition: 情況正常、正面、合適 (sound; positive; fit; appropriate)

examples.jyutping: gin6 hong1 faat3 zin2
examples.translation: positive development

senses.definition: #警察 組織 (police force)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 警隊早前舉辦嘅展覽吸引咗好多市民參觀。
examples.jyutping: ging2 deoi2 zou2 cin4 geoi2 baan6 ge3 zin2 laam5 kap1 jan5 zo2 hou2 do1 si5 man4 caam1 gun1.
examples.translation: The exhibition held by the police force recently attracted many citizens to visit.

senses.definition: 覺得一樣嘢恐怖；#怕 (to be afraid of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: geng1 gwai2
examples.translation: to be afraid of ghost

senses.definition: #擔心；用嚟帶出一啲唔希望發生嘅壞情況 (to fear; to be frightened; to worry)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 geng1 ngo5 zou6 m4 saai3 wo3!
examples.translation: I fear that I can't finish it.

senses.definition: 城鎮中俾人同車通行嘅道路（量詞：條） (road; street)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gaai1 dou6 zi2 naam4
examples.translation: street directory

senses.definition: 同伴侶一齊過生活 (to share one's life with one's lover)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋已經認定咗大家，諗住同對方過人世㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ji5 ging1 jing6 ding6 zo2 daai6 gaa1, nam2 zyu6 tung4 deoi3 fong1 gwo3 jan4 sai3 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: We have already committed to each other and will live together ever after.

senses.definition: 即係#姑媽 （量詞：位／個） (father's elder sister)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 gu1 maa1 deoi3 ngo5 hou2 hou2.
examples.translation: My auntie is nice to me.

senses.definition: 左右相連嘅房間或者住屋；隔籬屋 (next door)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gaak3 lei4 uk1 lou5 wong2 hai6 go3 leng3 zai2.
examples.translation: My neighbour Lou-Wong is a hot guy.

senses.definition: 植物五大器官之一，用嚟支撐植株、吸收同埋儲存營養等（量詞：條） (root)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: syu6 gan1 laan6 zo2.
examples.translation: Tree roots are rotted away.

senses.definition: 賴以為歸依嘅地方 (home; place of residence)

examples.jyutping: zik6 gan1
examples.translation: to take root (in); to be rooted to; to establish a base

senses.definition: 中樂樂器；係一種撥弦樂器，通常放喺腰間嘅位置，用雙手彈奏；弦線嘅數量不定，十幾條到廿幾條都有（量詞：部／個） (guzheng; Chinese zither)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gu2 zang1 zi2 faat3
examples.translation: guzheng plucking skills

senses.definition: 一種茶餐廳飲品，俗稱「#和尚跳海」；做法係用生雞蛋打入一杯#滾水 度，形成半生熟狀 (poached egg in hot water, a drink served in Hong Kong-style cafés and prepared by cracking open a raw egg into a glass of boiling water and leaving it partially cooked, dubbed #和尚跳海 ("monk jumping into the sea"))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一齊行動，唔會拋低任何一方 (to stick together and act as one group)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 罷工最緊要共同進退，唔可以因為頂唔住就自己去返工。
examples.jyutping: baa6 gung1 zeoi3 gan2 jiu3 gung6 tung4 zeon3 teoi3, m4 ho2 ji5 jan1 wai6 ding2 m4 zyu6 zau6 zi6 gei2 heoi3 faan1 gung1.
examples.translation: Staying together is most important for our strike. We should not go back to work on our own just because we can't stand it.

senses.definition: 雖然時間好緊迫，但仍然能夠準時到達或者做完一件事 (to manage to be on time or manage to finish a task despite a tight deadline)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋搭的士，一定趕得切嘅。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 daap3 dik1 si2, jat1 ding6 gon2 dak1 cit3 ge3.
examples.translation: We'll arrive on time if we take a taxi.

senses.definition: 唔能夠準時到達或者做完一件事 (to fail to be on time; to fail to finish a task by the deadline)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你趕唔切交功課就麻煩喇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gon2 m4 cit3 gaau1 gung1 fo3 zau6 maa4 faan4 laa3!
examples.translation: If you can't hand in your homework on time, you'll be in trouble.

senses.definition: #公元 之前嘅年份 (Before the Common Era (BCE); Before Christ (BC); referring to the years before 1 AD in the Gregorian calendar)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.text: 公元前221年，秦始皇滅六國。
examples.jyutping: gung1 jyun4 cin4 ji6 ji6 jat1 nin4, ceon4 ci2 wong4 mit6 luk6 gwok3
examples.translation: In 221 BCE, the First Emperor of Qin completed the conquest of the other six major states.

senses.definition: 國際通用嘅紀年方式，以#耶穌 出世果年做第一年 (Common Era (CE); year in the Gregorian calendar; also referred to as AD (anno Domini))
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: gung1 jyun4 ji6 cin1 nin4

senses.definition: 派多啲人去處理某事 (to deploy more people)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 尋晚落馬州同皇崗口岸都加派咗人手。
examples.jyutping: cam4 maan5 lok6 maa5 zau1 tung4 wong4 gong1 hau2 ngon6 dou1 gaa1 paai3 zo2 jan4 sau2.
examples.translation: Extra staff were deployed last night at the Lok Ma Chau and Huanggang checkpoints.

senses.definition: 收返或者更改曾經講過嘅嘢 (to withdraw or modify one's previous remark; to correct oneself)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢一知自己講錯嘢即刻改口。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 zi1 zi6 gei2 gong2 co3 je5 zik1 haak1 goi2 hau2.
examples.translation: As soon as he knew he'd made a mistake, he immediately corrected himself.

senses.definition: 前綴，指過去嘅時間 (ago; before; earlier; used as a prefix)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: gau6 nin2
examples.translation: last year

senses.definition: 之前嘅；#前度 (former)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: gau6 lou5 sai3
examples.translation: former boss

senses.definition: 經歷咗好長時間嘅 (old; historical)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gau6 pang4 jau5
examples.translation: longtime friend

senses.definition: 已經出現咗或者用咗一段日子；開始耗損 (has already existed or been used for some time; worn out)

examples.jyutping: gau6 haai4
examples.translation: old shoes

senses.definition: 用嚟生產、加工產品嘅地方或者建築物，會擺放機器、原材料之類生產所需嘅嘢（量詞：間／個） (factory)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hei3 ce1 gung1 cong2
examples.translation: vehicle factory

senses.definition: 頸同膊頭痛 (to have neck and shoulder pain)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你坐到歪身歪勢，第時好易頸梗膊痛。
examples.jyutping: nei5 co5 dou3 waai1 san1 waai1 sai3, dai6 si4 hou2 ji6 geng2 gang2 bok3 tung3.
examples.translation: You sit in a poor posture. You will get neck and shoulder pain in the future.

senses.definition: 同一對阿爸阿媽生，年紀比自己大嘅女性；有時同父異母，或者同母異父，或者同一個監護人，亦可以稱為家姐 (elder sister)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我家姐大我十幾年，所以我哋冇咩嘢傾。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gaa1 ze1 daai6 ngo5 sap6 gei2 nin4, so2 ji5 ngo5 dei6 mou5 me1 je5 king1.
examples.translation: My elder sister is more than 10 years older than me, which is why we don't have much to talk about.

senses.definition: 支撐;豎立 (to put up; to erect)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gaa3 hei2 wan4 tai1
examples.translation: to set up a scaling ladder

senses.definition: 匆忙噉踏上旅途 (to travel in a hurry)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: lau6 je6 gon2 lou6
examples.translation: to travel overnight in a hurry

senses.definition: 一班#老姑婆 為咗互相照應而合住嘅屋；引申指女人打算用嚟終老嘅地方（但唔一定係同人合住）；通常話人住「姑婆屋」都有暗諷人或自嘲嫁唔出或者梳起唔嫁嘅意味（量詞：間） (spinster house; a shared home for old women unlikely to get married, literally "old ladies' home"; by extension a place where unmarried women spend their remaining years (either alone or sharing with others); when referred to, it is often not about the place itself, but rather to point out that the women in question are unlikely going to get married, often used in a satirical, joking or self-deprecating manner)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢三十幾歲都嫁唔出，睇嚟都要買定姑婆屋喇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 saam1 sap6 gei2 seoi3 dou1 gaa3 m4 ceot1, tai2 lai4 dou1 jiu3 maai5 ding6 gu1 po4 uk1 laa3.
examples.translation: She's well over 30 and still hasn't been able to get married. It looks like she'll have to buy herself a spinster house.

senses.definition: 形容液體温度高，接近沸點 (boiling hot)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 啲湯好滾㗎，吹凍啲先飲啦。
examples.jyutping: di1 tong1 hou2 gwan2 gaa3, ceoi1 dung3 di1 sin1 jam2 laa1.
examples.translation: The soup is boiling hot. Blow on it to cool it off some before you drink it.

senses.definition: #火滾；好嬲 (very angry)

examples.text: 我好滾，不過我忍住冇鬧佢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 gwan2, bat1 gwo3 ngo5 jan2 zyu6 mou5 naau6 keoi5.
examples.translation: I was so angry, but I restrained myself from quarrelling with him.

senses.definition: #最近 嘅一段時期 (recently; in recent times)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gan6 kei4 gu2 gaa3 zau2 sai3 dim2 joeng2
examples.translation: How is the trend of stock price recently?

senses.definition: 屋企人一代傳一代咁傳落嚟又珍而重之嘅嘢 (heirloom; a valuable object that has been given by older members of a family to younger members of the same family over many years)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢塊玉係我哋唯一嘅傳家之寶。
examples.jyutping: ni1 faai3 juk2 hai6 ngo5 dei6 wai4 jat1 ge3 cyun4 gaa1 zi1 bou2.
examples.translation: This piece of jade is the only heirloom we've got.

senses.definition: 將一個建築物拆咗，喺嗰度重新起過第二啲嘢，或者根據新嘅需要去改造佢 (to repurpose a building or site)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 政府決定將馬場改建做公園。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 kyut3 ding6 zoeng1 maa5 coeng4 goi2 gin3 zou6 gung1 jyun2.
examples.translation: The government decided to repurpose the racecourse into a park.

senses.definition: 正式語體入面，放喺雙音節動詞之前，用嚟強調完成該動作嘅手段、途徑、方式嘅被動結構 (in formal context, added in front of a disyllabic verb to form a passive construction that emphasises how an action is done)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個假設可以用腦部核磁共振掃描加以證實。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gaa2 cit3 ho2 ji5 jung6 nou5 bou6 hat6 ci4 gung6 zan3 sou3 miu4 gaa1 ji5 zing3 sat6.
examples.translation: This hypothesis can be confirmed with a magnetic-resonance scan of the brain.

senses.definition: #噉樣 嘅加強語氣版；噉樣嘅#情況 ((emphatic form of #噉樣 gam2 joeng2) in this manner; in this way; like so)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 wui5 hai6 gam2 joeng2 joeng2 gaa3?
examples.translation: Why is it in this way?

senses.definition: 講真話 (to tell the truth; to be honest; to be frank)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: gong2 zan1 aa1, ngo5 zung6 mei6 sik6 baau2 gaa3.
examples.translation: To be frank, I am still kind of peckish.

senses.definition: 認真講句 (to be earnest; to speak in all seriousness)

examples.jyutping: gong2 zan1, ngo5 jau5 nam2 gwo3 bou3 ging2.
examples.translation: In all seriousness though, I have considered calling the police.

senses.definition: 同一對阿爸阿媽生，年紀比自己大嘅男性；有時同父異母，或者同母異父，亦可以稱為哥哥；#大佬（量詞：個） (elder brother)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 go4 go1 seng4 jat6 maai5 je5 bei2 ngo5.
examples.translation: My elder brother often buys me things.

senses.definition: 對年紀唔大嘅男性嘅友善稱呼（量詞：個／位） (a friendly way to address a young male)

examples.jyutping: sei3 ngaan5 go4 go1
examples.translation: young man with glasses

senses.definition: 以物資或者服務滿足他人需要 (to supply; to furnish)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個灶房供應咗成間大學嘅膳食。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 zou3 fong4 gung1 jing3 zo2 seng4 gaan1 daai6 hok6 ge3 sin6 sik6.
examples.translation: This canteen supplies the meals for the whole campus.

senses.definition: 結束#電話 通話 (to hang up a phone call)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我想同佢講啲嘢，不過佢收咗線。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 soeng2 tung4 keoi5 gong2 di1 je5, bat1 gwo3 keoi5 sau1 zo2 sin3.
examples.translation: I wanted to talk to him, but he hung the phone up.

senses.definition: #空 嘅住宅（睇「#吉」）（量詞：間） (unoccupied dwelling (see #吉 gat1))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jau5 gaan1 gat1 uk1 ceot1 sau6.
examples.translation: She has an empty flat for sale.

senses.definition: 誇張咁形容程度好大 (very; extremely; literally: ghost-like)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gwai2 gam3 ceon2.
examples.translation: He is really dumb.

senses.definition: 得一個轆嘅#手推車（量詞：架／部） (wheelbarrow)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你用架雞公車運啲磚去嗰度啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jung6 gaa3 gai1 gung1 ce1 wan6 di1 zyun1 heoi3 go2 dou6 laa1.
examples.translation: Take the wheelbarrow and bring the bricks over there.

senses.definition: 加插喺述賓結構輕讀，表示完成相關動作相對輕易，甚至令人感到享受；通常輕讀 (used to indicate that the action is relatively easy, relaxing and even enjoyable; added in predicate-object constructions, usually pronounced unstressed)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: sik6 go3 ti1
examples.translation: to have a tea break

senses.definition: 用説話解釋清楚 (to explain clearly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個問題我已經同老闆講解得好清楚。
examples.jyutping: go3 man6 tai4 ngo5 ji5 ging1 tung4 lou5 baan2 gong2 gaai2 dak1 hou2 cing1 co2.
examples.translation: I have already explained the matter clearly to our supervisor.

senses.definition: 指一件事差少少就發生 (almost)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gei1 fu4 bei2 tiu4 se4 ngaau5 can1.
examples.translation: He was almost bitten by a snake.

senses.definition: 啱啱好喺某一個特定嘅時間 (at the right moment)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 lai4 dak1 hou2 hap6 si4.
examples.translation: He turned up just at the right moment.

senses.definition: 喺授予動詞後面，放喺受事者前面嘅介詞，可以省略 (an optional preposition placed before the recipient of a dative verb (usually an action that involves giving or doing something to/for someone))
senses.label: 介詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 bei2 di1 cin2 gwo3 nei5.
examples.translation: I will give some money to you.

senses.definition: 由果實嘅果肉搾出嚟嘅液體（量詞：樽／支／杯） (fruit juice)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sin1 zaa3 gwo2 zap1
examples.translation: fresh squeezed juice

senses.definition: #香港 自創、喺香港流行、由香港改造、有香港特色嘅嘢 (Hong Kong style)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 zung1 ji3 jam2 gong2 sik1 naai5 caa4.
examples.translation: I don't like Hong Kong style milk tea.

senses.definition: 政治實體裏面，享有法律規定下嘅權利同需要承擔義務嘅人 （量詞：個） (citizen)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 身為香港嘅公民，要對香港有承擔。
examples.jyutping: san1 wai4 hoeng1 gong2 ge3 gung1 man4, jiu3 deoi3 hoeng1 gong2 jau5 sing4 daam1.
examples.translation: As her citizens, we have to devote ourselves to Hong Kong.

senses.definition: 望；旁觀 (to spectate; to witness; to view)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gun1 hon3 gei2 luk6
examples.translation: view record

senses.definition: 放喺名詞組前面，用嚟帶出主題或者涉及嘅範圍 (about; with regard to; concerning)
senses.label: 介詞

examples.text: 今次又引發咗另一輪關於安樂死嘅爭論。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 jau6 jan5 faat3 zo2 ling6 jat1 leon4 gwaan1 jyu1 on1 lok6 sei2 ge3 zang1 leon6.
examples.translation: It set off another round of debate concerning euthanasia.

senses.definition: 一個非常之愛狗，愛到好似願意為寵物狗做奴隸嘅主人；特別係將寵物狗當做自己仔女來錫，願意花好多時間，精力，同埋金錢喺佢地身上嘅狗主 (dog owner who spends large amounts of time, energy and money on taking care of their pet dogs, as if they are the slaves of their dogs; literally: dog slave)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 身為稱職嘅狗奴，我當然凡事都以狗狗排第一！
examples.jyutping: san1 wai4 cing3 zik1 ge3 gau2 nou4, ngo5 dong1 jin4 faan4 si6 dou1 ji5 gau2 gau2 paai4 dai6 jat1!
examples.translation: Being a competent "dog slave", I always put my dog as a top priority!

senses.definition: 改變原定嘅事情 (to change; to alter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 選民更改地址需要預早申請。
examples.jyutping: syun2 man4 gang1 goi2 dei6 zi2 seoi1 jiu3 jyu6 zou2 san1 cing2.
examples.translation: Voters have to apply in advance for changing their home addresses.

senses.definition: 利用形勢利己，唔講原則嘅做法 (opportunism)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 議會入面嘅機會主義政客唔會錯失每一次攻擊政敵嘅機會。
examples.jyutping: ji5 wui2 jap6 min6 ge3 gei1 wui6 zyu2 ji6 zing3 haak3 m4 wui5 co3 sat1 mui5 jat1 ci3 gung1 gik1 zing3 dik6 ge3 gei1 wui6.
examples.translation: The opportunist politicians in the parliament would not miss any chance to attack their political rivals.

senses.definition: 令物件、政策、措施等變得強啲、穩陣啲 (to reinforce; to strengthen)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gaa1 koeng4 gaam1 gun2 gai1 coeng4
examples.translation: to strengthen the official surveillance of chicken farms

senses.definition: 簡單而優美 (succinct; terse; pithy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: man4 bat1 gaan2 git3
examples.translation: written in a succinct style

senses.definition: 即係#膽、面對挑戰嘅勇氣，英文字「guts」嘅譯音。 (courage, transliteration of the English word 'guts')
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢份人冇乜吉士，有咩風吹草動，就淨係識得走。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 mou5 mat1 gat1 si2, jau5 me1 fung1 ceoi1 cou2 dung6, zau6 zing6 hai6 sik1 dak1 zau2.
examples.translation: He doesn't have the guts to deal with things head on but runs away at the slightest hint of danger.

senses.definition: 又作卡士達（醬），係一款以英式蛋奶醬(crème anglaise) 為基底所延伸出嚟而出嘅多用途甜醬，用牛奶、 香草、蛋黃、砂糖 、麪粉等煮成。 (custard)
要#盡快 做 (to do in hurry)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ting1 jat6 jiu3 gaau1 laa3, faai3 di1 zou6 laa1.
examples.translation: Tomorrow is the deadline, do it quickly.

senses.definition: 喺某啲嘢（例如地）上面，去整一啲原本冇嘅嘢出嚟；製造#建築物 (to construct; to build; to make)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gin3 zou6 jip6
examples.translation: construction industry

senses.definition: #落；#下跌；#減少；#貶低 (to fall; to drop; to decrease; to disparage)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gong3 dai1
examples.translation: to reduce

senses.definition: 背叛者, #內鬼 (a traitor; a spy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ci5 fu4 go3 dong2 jap6 min6 jau5 gaan1 gwai2
examples.translation: There seems some traitor in the party.

senses.definition: 好多困難要克服，要付出好多努力嚟完成；形容一件工程或者任務 ((usually of tasks) arduous; difficult to surmount)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 編纂粵語字典係一件艱巨嘅任務。
examples.jyutping: pin1 zyun2 jyut6 jyu5 zi6 din2 hai6 jat1 gin6 gaan1 geoi6 ge3 jam6 mou6.
examples.translation: Compiling a Cantonese dictionary is an arduous job.

senses.definition: #離合器；又可以解做操控離合器嘅踏板 (clutch, a mechanical device that engages and disengages the power transmission in a vehicle)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 極力子如果控制適宜，當然順頭順路啦；假如控制不當，就瓣瓣唔妥。
examples.jyutping: gik6 lik1 zi2 jyu4 gwo2 hung3 zai3 sik1 ji4, dong1 jin2 seon6 tau4 seon6 lou6 laa1, gaa2 jyu4 hung3 zai3 bat1 dong3, zau6 faan6 faan6 m4 to5.
examples.translation: If you get your clutch control right, you will drive smoothly. If you cannot get it right, everything will be problematic.

senses.definition: 經過好多次 (many times; several times; time and again)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gei2 ging1 san1 fu2
examples.translation: to endure hardship again and again

senses.definition: 即係個人#演唱會，大部分時間都係一個歌手自己表演（量詞：場） (solo concert)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 「歌神」嘅巡迴個唱即將去到最後一站。
examples.jyutping: go1 san4 ge3 ceon4 wui4 go3 coeng3 zik1 zoeng1 heoi3 dou3 zeoi3 hau6 jat1 zaam6.
examples.translation: The last trip of the tour concert of the "God of Songs" is approaching.

senses.definition: 收錄歌曲曲譜同歌詞嘅書（量詞：本） (song book)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 點解以前養得起唔少歌書，而家就一本都養唔起呢？
examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 ji5 cin4 joeng5 dak1 hei2 m4 siu2 go1 syu1, ji4 gaa1 zau6 jat1 bun2 dou1 joeng5 m4 hei2 ne1?
examples.translation: Why did song books use to be greatly marketable in the past but no longer survive now?

senses.definition: 隨購買電子產品或者電器等所附送嘅嘢 (parts, fittings or souvenirs that come with the purchase of electronic products)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gan1 gei1 syut3 ming4 syu1
examples.translation: user manual which comes with the product

senses.definition: 即係氫氧化鈉（NaOH），係一種強鹼，腐蝕性強；呢個俗稱通常同清潔用途有關，係從英文慣用名頭一個字音譯過嚟 (caustic soda (transliteration of the first word which is often confined to cleansing use))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: go1 si6 dik1 ho2 ji5 tung1 keoi4.
examples.translation: Caustic soda can be used to unblock the drainage.

senses.definition: 行為；態度 (conduct; behaviour; manner)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hang4 wai4 geoi2 zi2
examples.translation: behaviour

senses.definition: 從頭到尾；一開始 (since the very beginning)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gan1 bun2 nam2 dou1 mei6 nam2 gwo3.
examples.translation: He hasn't thought of it since the very beginning.

senses.definition: 完全，帶講者對事實肯定嘅態度；通常用喺否定句 (intensifier; completely; definitely; often used in negative utterances meaning 'definitely not', 'absolutely no' or 'not at all')

examples.text: 今日根本冇可能會落雨喎。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 gan1 bun2 mou5 ho2 nang4 wui5 lok6 jyu5 wo3
examples.translation: It definitely won't rain today.

senses.definition: 形容人完全冇#頭髮 ((of a person) bald)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: kei4 sat6 gwong1 tau4 dou1 ho2 ji5 hou2 jing4.
examples.translation: Bald could be cool too.

senses.definition: 工人之間互相嘅稱呼（量詞：個） (fellow worker)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 負責打掃雜務嘅人（量詞：個） (manual worker)

examples.text: 可唔可以請工友幫手啊？
examples.jyutping: ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 ceng2 gung1 jau5 bong1 sau2 aa3?
examples.translation: Can you ask the manual worker to help?

senses.definition: 由原本嘅#職位 變做低啲嘅層級 (to reduce to a lower rank; to demote)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢犯咗個好嚴重嘅錯，所以畀人降職。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 faan6 zo2 go3 hou2 jim4 zung6 ge3 co3, so2 ji5 bei2 jan4 gong3 zik1.
examples.translation: She made a huge mistake and thus was demoted.

senses.definition: #高明 嘅#見解（量詞:個） (good view)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 jau5 mat1 je5 gou1 gin3 ne1?
examples.translation: What insightful views do you have?

senses.definition: 係突發情況下諗到應付方法 (quick-wittedness; nimbleness of mind in dealing with emergencies; a calm and quickly responsive mind, esp. in a crisis; capable of making quick and intelligent decisions, esp. in times of crisis or danger)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢全靠急智，先可以安然脱險。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 cyun4 kaau3 gap1 zi3, sin1 ho2 ji5 on1 jin4 tyut3 him2.
examples.translation: Thanks to his quick-wittedness, he can make it through without even a scratch.

senses.definition: 加一啲額外嘅嘢，去達到好啲嘅效果 (to do sth in addition to achieve a better outcome)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今年呢間酒店喺聖誕前加料安排合唱團獻唱悦耳動聽嘅聖詩。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin2 ni1 gaan1 zau2 dim3 hai2 sing3 daan3 cin4 gaa1 liu2 on1 paai4 hap6 coeng3 tyun4 hin3 coeng3 jyut6 ji5 dung6 ting3 ge3 sing3 si1.
examples.translation: This year the hotel has additionally arranged a choir to sing hymns before Christmas.

senses.definition: 加一啲古怪嘅嘢落去嘢食嘢飲入面 (to add strange things into food or drinks; to spike)

examples.text: 呢杯可樂加咗料喎！鹹嘅？
examples.jyutping: ni1 bui1 ho2 lok6 gaa1 zo2 liu2 wo3! haam4 ge2?
examples.translation: This cup of coke tastes strange! Why is it salty?

senses.definition: 多過理想嘅份量，引起反效果 (too many; too much; excessive)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 過多嘅讚賞係會令人有傲氣。
examples.jyutping: gwo3 do1 ge3 zaan3 soeng2 hai6 wui5 ling6 jan4 jau5 ngou6 hei3.
examples.translation: Too much compliment will make people arrogant.

senses.definition: #部份；某一個；有啲 (specific; some but not all)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: go3 bit6 hok6 saang1
examples.translation: a specific student; some students

senses.definition: 孤立而冇代表性嘅 (isolated; unrepresentative)

examples.jyutping: go3 bit6 lai6 zi2
examples.translation: isolated and unrepresentative case

senses.definition: 指出過失，加以批評 (to criticize)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢份人行事專橫，成日俾人詬病。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 hang4 si6 zyun1 waang4, seng4 jat6 bei2 jan4 gau3 beng6.
examples.translation: He is often criticized for acting in a despotic manner.

senses.definition: 將仔女或者寵物交俾外人照顧 (to entrust a child to the care of sby; to ask sby to bring up a child or to take care of a pet)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢將個仔寄養喺朋友屋企。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zoeng1 go3 zai2 gei3 joeng5 hai2 pang4 jau5 uk1 kei2.
examples.translation: He left his child in the care of his friend.

senses.definition: 為工作或服務需要去人哋屋企探訪，尤其係教師或者社工做嘅探訪 (to pay a home visit, especially one done by teachers or social workers)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 老師今日落堂之後要去家訪。
examples.jyutping: lou5 si1 gam1 jat6 lok6 tong4 zi1 hau6 jiu3 heoi3 gaa1 fong2
examples.translation: The teacher has to visit the parents of his schoolchildren after class today.

senses.definition: 昂貴而且重要 (valuable; precious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gwai3 zung6 mat6 ban2
examples.translation: valuable articles

senses.definition: 戒除吸毒嘅習慣；唔再食毒品 (to abstain from taking drugs)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢戒毒之後比之前健康咗好多。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gaai3 duk6 zi1 hau6 bei2 zi1 cin4 gin6 hong1 zo2 hou2 do1.
examples.translation: He is much healthier after abstain from taking drugs.

senses.definition: 行路嘅時間好似跛跛地噉 (to hobble; to limp off)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢行路趷下趷下噉，唔知係咪扭親腳呢？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 haang4 lou6 gat6 haa5 gat6 haa5 gam2, m4 zi1 hai6 mai6 nau2 can1 goek3 ne1?
examples.translation: He hobbles along the road, I wonder if he has sprained his ankle?

senses.definition: 同主流或者平時唔一樣，令人覺得疑惑 (eccentric; odd)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: pei4 hei3 gu2 gwaai3
examples.translation: eccentric disposition

senses.definition: 將#束縛 消除；得到自由 (to liberate; to emancipate; to free something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gaai2 fong3 hak1 nou4
examples.translation: to emancipate the black slaves

senses.definition: 專指中國共產黨推翻國民黨統治 (specifically refers to the overthrow of Kuomintang administration by the Chinese Communist Party)

examples.jyutping: gaai2 fong3 cin4
examples.translation: before the "liberation

senses.definition: 維持公共秩序嘅人（量詞：個） (disciplinary officer; marshall)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cing1 git3 gau2 caat3
examples.translation: cleaning ambassador

senses.definition: 一樣嘢因為機會或者偶然而發生，事前冇特登計劃過 (by chance)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gam3 ngaam1 dak1 gam3 kiu2
examples.translation: coincidentally; fortuitously; by chance

senses.definition: 廣大寬闊；範圍大 (wide; vast; broad)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gaau1 jau4 gwong2 fut3
examples.translation: with a wide acquaintance

senses.definition: 一種球類運動，用一枝特定嘅球杆將粒細波打入果嶺或者草地上嘅窿，用最少杆數成功嗰個就算贏 (golf)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gou1 ji5 fu1 kau4 coeng4
examples.translation: golf course

senses.definition: 打高爾夫球用嘅波 (golf ball)
#生活；#度日 (to live)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hou2 hou2 gwo3 jat6 zi2
examples.translation: to live a good life

senses.definition: 睇落好#攰、好冇精神嘅樣 (a tired face)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 min6 gyun6 jung4
examples.translation: an exhausted appearance

senses.definition: 唔屬於任何國家領海嘅海域 (high sea; international waters)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 所有國家嘅人都有權利係公海釣魚。
examples.jyutping: so2 jau5 gwok3 gaa1 ge3 jan4 dou1 jau5 kyun4 lei6 hai6 gung1 hoi2 diu3 jyu2.
examples.translation: All countries' people are entitled to fishing on international waters.

jyutping: gwan1 zi2 zi1 gaau1 daam6 jyu4 seoi2

gwan zi zi gaau daam jyu seoi

senses.definition: 喺去其他地方途中，短暫到過某處 (to pass through; to pass by)

senses.definition: 指一個人手腳嘅靈活度同埋耐力，泛指#體格 (one's physique; literally: bone and sinew)

examples.translation: He has disinfectant and wet wipes in his pockets, is he mysophobic?

senses.definition: 修飾程度，即係一般，有啲；唔算好好/好多，又唔算好差/好少 (quite; fairly; rather)

senses.definition: 即係#關羽，係#三國 時代嘅人物。因為喺歷史小説《三國演義》入面同劉備、張飛#結拜 做兄弟，排行第二而得名。後來獲奉為神祇，同時係忠義、武勇嘅神，亦係「武財神」，所以商界、警察同黑社會都會供奉佢。 (Guan Yu, a general from the Three Kingdoms period, who was revered as the God of War. He represents loyalty and brotherhood, and is worshiped by business, police officers and triad society members in Hong Kong.)

examples.translation: There's something suspicious about this fellow. Have somebody tail him and let me know right away if something's up.

senses.definition: 加喺帶有數量嘅詞組後面，表示淨係、只得；字面上「大把」指好多，不過「咁大把」只會用作反話 ((used after a phrase that contains a number) just; only; merely; "大把" literally means "a lot", but the phrase "咁大把" is almost always used sarcastically)

senses.definition: 從事商業、買賣活動；做生意 (to run business; to engage in trade)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: My father does business overseas and seldom returns to Hong Kong.

senses.definition: 接近 (close to; little short of)

examples.translation: to know what is disgraceful is a step towards courage

senses.definition: #秋天 嘅浪漫而有詩意嘅叫法 (romantic, poetic address of autumn)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 禁止播放某啲廣告、影視節目、歌曲 (to ban the broadcast of some commercials, films, songs, TV programs and dramas, etc.)

examples.translation: TV dramas with unacceptable contents will be banned.

senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: I have a classmate with ADHD, and he had trouble concentrating, but he trained himself gradually and excelled academically.

senses.definition: 實行事情之前擬定嘅方案、步驟（量詞：個） (plan; project; programme; scheme)

examples.text: 我哋應該準備一個臨時應變計劃。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 jing1 goi1 zeon2 bei6 jat1 go3 lam4 si4 jing3 bin3 gai3 waak6.

examples.jyutping: nin4 cing1 jan4 jing1 goi1 gai3 waak6 haa5 zoeng1 loi4.

senses.definition: #公德心 (concern for public welfare; public-mindedness; social morality; social ethics)

examples.jyutping: nei5 seng4 jat6 daa2 zim1 gam3 mou5 gung1 dak1 gaa3.

senses.definition: 用腳嚟控制機器、機械等嘅掣，例如汽車嘅#極力子、#迫力 同#油門，#衣車 嘅控制器；不過樂器嘅腳掣通常會叫#pedal 比較多 (a device used to allow one's foot to control a machine, a pedal (excluding pedals in musical instruments, which are commonly referred to using the English term "pedal"))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 有時專指#迫力 (vehicle brake pedal)

examples.jyutping: go3 si1 gei1 jau2 mun4 dong3 goek3 zai3.

senses.definition: 按照事物嘅特性而作出分類 (to categorize; to classify)

senses.definition: 意想不到；出乎意料之外嘅；聽到或者見到會嚇咗一嚇嘅 (surprised; amazed)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gong2 ge3 je5 ling6 jan4 ging1 ngaa5!
examples.translation: What he says surprises me.

senses.definition: 追查；探求 (to investigate; to study; to research)

examples.jyutping: jin4 gau3
examples.translation: to study; to research

senses.definition: 去到極限；到底 (after all; in the end; ultimately; exactly)

examples.translation: exactly

senses.definition: 限制；局限；束縛 (to halter; to restrain; to bind; to control)

senses.definition: 麻雀術語；指回報最低最易食出嘅牌型，入面混雜至少二種牌色(筒、索、萬)及多於一種牌型(#碰 同#上)，並且唔係#自摸 食出，回報為牌局中最低單位(如打「一二蚊」即雞糊得一蚊，一番得兩蚊)，而港式台灣牌嘅玩法，就計 10 番。 (mahjong jargon; Chicken Hand: the easiest set of tiles to claim a win, but with the lowest table reward. It mixes up of at least 2 type of suits (circle, bamboo, character tiles), and melds with both sequence and triplet, and the last tile didn't come from Self-drawn. Literally: chicken porridge)

慶祝節日 (to celebrate a festival)

senses.definition: 可以利用嘅特質 (utility; some property that can be utilized or exploited)

senses.definition: （普通話「購物 gòuwù」嘅音譯）本身嘅意思係「買嘢」；2014 年反佔中遊行參與者被傳媒訪問，問到來港嘅目的，一時諗唔起廣東話點講，用咗普通話講「購物」一詞，暴露咗外地人嘅身分；後來大家用粵語諧音嘅「鳩嗚」將呢個字寫出嚟，去表達字面上「亂咁嗌」、「亂咁講嘢」嘅意思，同時亦都用嚟諷刺自由行喺香港瘋狂買嘢嘅行為 (phonetic loan from Putonghua gòuwù (購物, to go shopping), the characters literally mean "to shout or speak crazily out of control"; the word became the subject of an internet meme in 2014 when an anti-"Occupy Central" protester was interviewed by a news reporter. The protester intended to say she was shopping in Hong Kong but forgot how to say it in Cantonese, and uttered the word 'to shop' in Putonghua, revealing that she is not a local resident. The phrase has since been used to deride mainland tourists' shopping spree in Hong Kong.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋今晚去旺角鳩嗚咯！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 gam1 maan5 heoi3 wong6 gok3 gau1 wu1 lo3!
examples.translation: Let's go gau-wu (i.e. shopping) in Mongkok tonight!

examples.text: 交通燈上面個綠色公仔眨緊就唔好過馬路喇！
examples.jyutping: gaau1 tung1 dang1 soeng6 min6 go3 luk6 sik1 gung1 zai2 zaam2 gan2 zau6 m4 hou2 gwo3 maa5 lou6 laa3!
examples.translation: Don't start crossing the road when the walk sign is flashing.

senses.definition: #擔心；#著緊 (to worry about, to be concerned with the well being of somebody, to care)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個個父母都緊張自己仔女㗎啦。
examples.jyutping: go3 go3 fu6 mou5 dou1 gan2 zoeng1 zi6 gei2 zai2 neoi2 gaa3 laa1.
examples.translation: It is natural that all parents are concerned about their children.

senses.definition: 政府持有嘅土地（量詞：塊） (government-owned land)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: paak3 maai6 gun1 dei6
examples.translation: to auction some crown land

senses.definition: 四分之一；源於英文 quarter 嘅第一個音節（量詞：個） (quarter; one fourth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 dim2 saam1 go3 gwat1
examples.translation: quarter to two; literally, one o'clock and three quarters

senses.definition: 形容建築物#結實、#穩陣 ((of buildings) solid; firm; stout)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gin1 gu3 ge3 bou2 leoi5
examples.translation: a stout fortress

senses.definition: 指本身唔識發光嘅嘢#反射 其他光源，好似識發光噉嘅效果 (gloss; lustre)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我幫架車打咗蠟，睇落勁有光澤。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bong1 gaa3 ce1 daa2 zo2 laap6, tai2 lok6 ging6 jau5 gwong1 zaak6.
examples.translation: I have waxed my car and it looks glossy now.

senses.definition: #技術、#造詣 可以達到嘅某種程度 ((of skills or attainments) a whole new level; mastery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢嘅廚藝已經達到出神入化嘅境界。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 cyu4 ngai6 ji5 ging1 daat6 dou3 ceot1 san4 jap6 faa3 ge3 ging2 gaai3.
examples.translation: His cooking skills have already reached an extraordinary level.

senses.definition: 加入隊伍、團隊 (to join a team)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 超級射手雲尼斯達羅即將加盟曼聯。
examples.jyutping: ciu1 kap1 se6 sau2 wan4 nei4 si1 daat6 lo4 zik1 zoeng1 gaa1 mang4 maan6 lyun4.
examples.translation: Superstriker Ruud van Nistelrooy is joining Manchester United.

senses.definition: （形容人或者氣氛）唔正常；奇怪 ((of people or atmosphere) abnormal; strange)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 hang4 wai4 hou2 gwai2 ji6.
examples.translation: His behaviours are so strange.

senses.definition: #提供#電力；#發電 然後將電力#輸出 (to supply electricity; to power, often a building, city or a nation)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 香港大部份嘅發電廠都係由化石燃料供電。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 daai6 bou6 fan6 ge3 faat3 din6 cong2 dou1 hai6 jau4 faa3 sek6 jin4 liu2 gung1 din6.
examples.translation: Most of the power of Hong Kong is supplied through the burning of fossil fuel.

senses.definition: 結婚之後全職打理#家頭細務、照顧屋企人嘅女人（量詞：個） (housewife)

examples.text: 結婚之後，佢希望太太辭職留喺屋企做家庭主婦。
examples.jyutping: git3 fan1 zi1 hau6, keoi5 hei1 mong6 taai3 taai2 ci4 zik1 lau4 hai2 uk1 kei2 zou6 gaa1 ting4 zyu2 fu5.

senses.definition: 液態或者氣態水遇冷至冰點時變成固體嘅現象 (to freeze)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: dung3 dou3 ngo5 git3 bing1 aa3.
examples.translation: It is so cold that I am freezing.

senses.definition: 要克服好多困難，需要好多努力先完成到，甚至冇辦法完成；通常形容一啲經歷 (difficult; hard)

examples.jyutping: gwo2 di1 gaan1 naan4 ge3 sang1 wut6

examples.text: 呢度係警察學校嘅舊址。
examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 hai6 ging2 caat3 hok6 haau6 ge3 gau6 zi2.
examples.translation: Here is the former site of police school.

senses.definition: 消滅一樣嘢嘅根部或者基礎；完全剿滅 (to eradicate thoroughly; to root out; to thoroughly do away with)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gan2 ceoi4 taam1 wu1
examples.translation: to eradicate corruption

senses.definition: #專登；#刻意（帶負面意思） (deliberately; intentionally (carries a negative connotation))
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢故意問啲好難嘅問題。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gu3 ji3 man6 di1 hou2 naan4 ge3 man6 tai4.
examples.translation: He intentionally asked those difficult questions.

senses.definition: 當一個人有危險嗰陣幫對方解困；拯救對方嘅生命 (to save one's life)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 ji1 sang1 gau3 zo2 ngo5 jat1 meng6.
examples.translation: This doctor saved my life.

senses.definition: #管束、#教導 (to discipline)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gaa1 zoeng2 gun2 gaau3 zi2 neoi5 hai6 jing1 goi1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Parents should discipline their children.

senses.definition: 詭變多詐，多#詭計、#奸計；信唔過 (sly; cunning; crafty)

examples.text: 狡猾嘅小偷呃個警察話去廁所，跟住由後門走咗。
examples.jyutping: gaau2 waat6 ge3 siu2 tau1 ngaak1 go3 ging2 caat3 waa6 heoi3 ci3 so2, gan1 zyu6 jau4 hau6 mun2 zau2 zo2.
examples.translation: The cunning thief escaped from the backdoor after telling the cop that he needed to use the toilet.

senses.definition: 即係「健力士世界紀錄」，有時會翻譯做「金氏（世界紀錄）」或者「吉尼斯（世界紀錄）」，收錄咗好多世界之最；例如世界上最高嘅人。 (Guinness World Records)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 咁多人參加呢個活動，一定入到健力士啦！
examples.jyutping: gam3 do1 jan4 caam1 gaa1 ni1 go3 wut6 dung6, jat1 ding6 jap6 dou2 gin6 lik6 si6 laa1!
examples.translation: So many people are participating in this activity, it must able to enter the Guinness World Records!

senses.definition: 向上拎高啲嘢 (to lift; to raise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 geoi2 hei2 zo2 sau2.
examples.translation: He raised his left arm.

senses.definition: 距離社會當時嘅價值觀好遠、#激烈 (extreme; radical)

examples.text: 嘩，你剃光頭呀？乜咁激啊？
examples.jyutping: waa3 nei5 tai3 gwong1 tau4 aa4? mat1 gam3 gik1 aa3?

senses.definition: 同#型 (rad; awesome; cool)

examples.jyutping: waa3! faat3 laai1 lei2! gik1 aa3!
examples.translation: Wow, a Ferrari! Sweet!

senses.definition: 足以代表一國嘅技藝 (national pastime; national sport)

senses.definition: 音調高嘅聲音 (a high pitched tone)

senses.definition: #香港 同#澳門 嘅合稱 (short form of Hong Kong and Macau)

senses.definition: 本指對辛苦嘅工作感到厭倦；其後引指官員辭職 (resignation of officials)

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
幼身嘅#紅蘿蔔（量詞：條） (carrot)

senses.definition: 度過#冬天 (to spend the winter)

examples.jyutping: jung6 fo1 gei6 goi2 loeng4 dou6 mai5 caan2 loeng6.

senses.definition: 隸屬某區嘅差人同其他職員辦公嘅建築物，亦係存放裝備、車輛以及羈留疑犯嘅場所；呢個係正式嘅叫法（量詞：間） (police station (this is the official word used on signs))

senses.definition: #雞 嘅睾丸，香港打邊爐嘅常見配料 (chicken testicles; a common ingredient for hotpot in Hong Kong)

senses.definition: #蝦、#蟹 之類甲殼類動物嘅#外殼；相對比較堅硬，可以保護到身體 (carapace; exoskeleton)

senses.definition: 維持喺高水平，或者持續#上升 (to soar high; to keep at a high level)

examples.translation: I throw a punch to him but he dodges it at ease.

examples.text: 你一個人住喺香港呀？噉，你有冇掛住屋企人啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 jat1 go3 jan2 zyu6 hai2 hoeng1 gong2 aa4? gam2, nei5 jau5 mou5 gwaa3 zyu6 uk1 kei2 jan4 aa3?

senses.definition: 認識並且成為朋友；接觸某人，建立關係 (to make acquaintance with; to know or associate with)

senses.definition: #尊敬 同#佩服 一個人嘅品格或者行為 (to respect; to admire)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 ging3 pui3 ngo5 ni1 wai2 pang4 jau5.
examples.translation: I respect and admire this friend very much.

senses.definition: #渡過#通宵；通常指喺#屋企 以外嘅地方 (to stay overnight; usually refers to places other than one's home)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我今晚去同學屋企過夜，唔返屋企瞓。

examples.translation: I'll stay overnight at my classmate's home; I'm not going home to sleep tonight.

senses.definition: 講出嚟，希望其他人跟住做嘅意見（量詞：個） (suggestion; advice)

examples.text: 你嘅建議幾好，我哋就噉做啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ge3 gin3 ji5 gei2 hou2, ngo5 dei6 zau6 gam2 zou6 laa1.

senses.definition: 提出意見，希望其他人跟住做 (to suggest; to propose; to recommend)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 gin3 ji5 gam1 jat6 jau1 wui5 jat1 tin1.

senses.definition: 女性同人#結婚 ((of women) to get married)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 waa6 m4 wui5 gaa3 jan4 wo5.
examples.translation: She said that she won't get married.

senses.definition: #直腸 嘅末端，排走#糞便 嘅地方（量詞：個） (anus)

examples.jyutping: gong2 mun4
examples.translation: anus

senses.definition: #部門 嘅#首長 （量詞：個） (director of a bureau; Secretary of a department in a government; head of a police station or fire station)

senses.definition: 個心好緊張，好趕時間噉 (in a hurry; in a haste)

senses.definition: 有冬菇碎粒嘅豬肉丸（量詞：粒） (pork ball with diced shiitake mushroom)

senses.definition: 所遭遇嘅不幸、悲慘情況（量詞：個） (unfortunate situation or circumstance; plight)

examples.translation: Each governmental department works as self-contained and autistic units. The lack of inter-departmental communication has wasted a lot of resource.
